9545362Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void SplitFiles(int[] newFiles, string inputFile)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string baseName = Path.GetFilenameWithoutExtension(inputFile);Di2015NewLine    string extension = Path.GetExtension(inputFile);Di2015NewLine    using (TextReader reader = File.OpenText(inputFile))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < newFiles.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string outputFile = baseName + i + extension;Di2015NewLine            if (File.Exists(outputFile))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Better than silently returning, I'd suggest...Di2015NewLine                throw new IOException("File already exists: " + outputFile);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int linesToCopy = newFiles[i];Di2015NewLine            using (TextWriter writer = File.CreateText(outputFile))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; i < linesToCopy; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                    if (line == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return; // Premature end of inputDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9564421Di2015UniqueSeparatorRGB(0, 0, 0)
9564421Di2015UniqueSeparatorRGB(10, 2, 3)
9564421Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int DELTA_PERCENT = 10;Di2015NewLineList<Color> alreadyChoosenColors = new List<Color>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// initialize the random generatorDi2015NewLineRandom r = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool chooseAnotherColor = true;      Di2015NewLine    while ( chooseAnotherColor )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // create a random color by generating three random channelsDi2015NewLine       //Di2015NewLine       int redColor = r.Next(0, 255);Di2015NewLine       int greenColor = r.Next(0, 255);Di2015NewLine       int blueColor = r.Next(0, 255);Di2015NewLine       Color tmpColor = Color.FromArgb(redColor, greenColor, blueColor);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // check if a similar color has already been createdDi2015NewLine       //Di2015NewLine       chooseAnotherColor = false;Di2015NewLine       foreach (Color c in alreadyChoosenColors)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          int delta = c.R * DELTA_PERCENT / 100;Di2015NewLine          if ( c.R-delta <= tmpColor.R && tmpColor.R <= c.R+delta )Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             chooseAnotherColor = true;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          delta = c.G * DELTA_PERCENT / 100;Di2015NewLine          if ( c.G-delta <= tmpColor.G && tmpColor.G <= c.G+delta )Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             chooseAnotherColor = true;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          delta = c.B * DELTA_PERCENT / 100;Di2015NewLine          if ( c.B-delta <= tmpColor.B && tmpColor.B <= c.B+delta )Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             chooseAnotherColor = true;Di2015NewLine             break;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    alreadyChoosenColors.Add(tmpColor);Di2015NewLine    // you can safely use the tmpColor hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine
9564425Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static BitmapImage LoadImage(byte[] imageData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (imageData == null || imageData.Length == 0) return null;Di2015NewLine        var image = new BitmapImage();Di2015NewLine        using (var mem = new MemoryStream(imageData))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mem.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            image.BeginInit();Di2015NewLine            image.CreateOptions = BitmapCreateOptions.PreservePixelFormat;Di2015NewLine            image.CacheOption = BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad;Di2015NewLine            image.UriSource = null;Di2015NewLine            image.StreamSource = mem;Di2015NewLine            image.EndInit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        image.Freeze();Di2015NewLine        return image;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9570589Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SemiCircle : ShapeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or set the alignment of the semicircle. I.e. where should the flat part point.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public SemiCircleAlignment AlignmentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (SemiCircleAlignment)GetValue(AlignmentProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(AlignmentProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for alignment.  This enables animation, styling, binding, etc...Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty AlignmentProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("Alignment", typeof(SemiCircleAlignment), typeof(SemiCircle), Di2015NewLine        new FrameworkPropertyMetadata(SemiCircleAlignment.Top,FrameworkPropertyMetadataOptions.AffectsRender));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override System.Windows.Media.Geometry DefiningGeometryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StreamGeometry geometry = new StreamGeometry();Di2015NewLine            using (StreamGeometryContext context = geometry.Open())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DrawSemiCircle(context);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            geometry.Freeze();Di2015NewLine            return geometry;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Size MeasureOverride(Size constraint)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (constraint.Height == double.PositiveInfinity || constraint.Width == double.PositiveInfinity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (double.IsNaN(Width) || double.IsNaN(Height))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new Size(0, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return new Size(Width, Height);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return constraint;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DrawSemiCircle(StreamGeometryContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double tOff = StrokeThickness / 2.0;                // an offset to account for stroke thicknessDi2015NewLine        Point startPt = new Point(tOff, tOff);                                   // upper left cornerDi2015NewLine        if (Alignment == SemiCircleAlignment.Bottom || Alignment == SemiCircleAlignment.Right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            startPt = new Point(ActualWidth - tOff, ActualHeight - tOff);        // or lower right cornerDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Point endPt = new Point(ActualWidth - tOff,tOff);                         // upper right cornerDi2015NewLine        if (Alignment == SemiCircleAlignment.Left || Alignment == SemiCircleAlignment.Bottom)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            endPt = new Point(tOff, ActualHeight - tOff);                         // or lower left cornerDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Size s = new Size(Math.Max(0.0,(ActualWidth / 2) - tOff), Di2015NewLine            Math.Max(0,ActualHeight - StrokeThickness));    // half width is radiusDi2015NewLine        SweepDirection sweep = SweepDirection.Counterclockwise;    Di2015NewLine        if (Alignment == SemiCircleAlignment.Left || Alignment == SemiCircleAlignment.Right)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            s = new Size(Math.Max(0,ActualWidth - StrokeThickness),Di2015NewLine                Math.Max(0.0,(ActualHeight / 2) - tOff));     // or half height is radiusDi2015NewLine            sweep = SweepDirection.Clockwise;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.BeginFigure(startPt, true, true);Di2015NewLine        context.ArcTo(endPt, s, 0, false, sweep, true, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum SemiCircleAlignment { Left, Top, Right, Bottom };Di2015NewLine

9579981Di2015UniqueSeparator// !! Note the % !!Di2015NewLineUINT GetValues(value class% JPVals) // value class, as C# structs are value types Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    // Allocate a buffer for serialization, pointer to NULLotherwiseDi2015NewLine    IntPtr ptr = Marshal::AllocHGlobal(Marshal::SizeOf(JPVals));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        // Serialize the managed object to "static" memory (not managed by the GC)Di2015NewLine        Marshal::StructureToPtr(JPVals, ptr, false); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Pass it to unmanaged code that will modify it.Di2015NewLine        auto ret = m_pComms->GetValues(reinterpret_cast<SJPVal*>(ptr.ToPointer()), 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copies the modifications backDi2015NewLine        Marshal::PtrToStructure(ptr, JPVals);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Free resourcesDi2015NewLine        Marshal::FreeHGlobal(ptr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    } catch (...) {Di2015NewLine        // Make sure we free the memoryDi2015NewLine        Marshal.FreeHGlobal(ptr);Di2015NewLine        throw; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

9581651Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class NetworkHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsNetworkConnectionAvailable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InternetConnectionState state = InternetConnectionState.INTERNET_CONNECTION_OFFLINE;Di2015NewLine        if (!InternetGetConnectedState(ref state, 0))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (state == InternetConnectionState.INTERNET_CONNECTION_OFFLINE)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping ping = new System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping();Di2015NewLine            System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply reply = ping.Send(KnownHostName, PingTimeout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return reply.Status == System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.Success;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const string KnownHostName = "http://www.microsoft.com";Di2015NewLine    private const int PingTimeout = 5000; // millisecondsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Flags]Di2015NewLine    private enum InternetConnectionState : intDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        INTERNET_CONNECTION_MODEM = 0x1,Di2015NewLine        INTERNET_CONNECTION_LAN = 0x2,Di2015NewLine        INTERNET_CONNECTION_PROXY = 0x4,Di2015NewLine        INTERNET_RAS_INSTALLED = 0x10,Di2015NewLine        INTERNET_CONNECTION_OFFLINE = 0x20,Di2015NewLine        INTERNET_CONNECTION_CONFIGURED = 0x40Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport("WININET", CharSet = System.Runtime.InteropServices.CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool InternetGetConnectedState(ref InternetConnectionState lpdwFlags, int dwReserved);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9586286Di2015UniqueSeparatorlast
9586286Di2015UniqueSeparatordb.AppointmentStatusHistoriesDi2015NewLine.Where(ash => first <= ash.TimeStamp) //omit all records that are before the rangeDi2015NewLine.Where(ash => ash.Appointment.TaskAppointments.Any(ta => ta.Task.Creator == user))Di2015NewLine.GroupBy(ash => ash.AppointmentId)Di2015NewLine.Select(g => g.OrderByDescending(ash => ash.TimeStamp).First()) //pick a winnerDi2015NewLine.Where(ash => ash.TimeStamp <= last) //omit winners that are after the rangeDi2015NewLine.Select(ash => new UserAppointmentTargetModel()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  AppointmentId = ash.AppointmentId,Di2015NewLine  AppoinementStatusId = ash.AppointmentStatus,Di2015NewLine  Date = ash.TimestampDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9586824Di2015UniqueSeparator// For this example let's say myContainer has 4 elements in it.Di2015NewLinefor ( int i = 0; i < myContainer.size(); ++i )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( someConditionIsMet )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myContainer.Remove(i);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorsomeConditionIsMet
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparator1.) i = 0, someConditionIsMet is false, so we do nothing.Di2015NewLine2.) i = 1, someConditionIsMet is true, so we remove myContainer at index 1. myContainer.size() is now 3.Di2015NewLine3.) i = 2, someConditionIsMet is false, so we do nothing.Di2015NewLine4.) i = 3, so we do not loop again because 3 is not less than myContainer.size(), which is 3.Di2015NewLine
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatori
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparator1
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatori
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparator3
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparator// For this example let's say myContainer has 4 elements in it.Di2015NewLinefor ( int i = myContainer.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( someConditionIsMet )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myContainer.Remove(i);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine1.) i = 3, someConditionIsMet is true, so we remove myContainer at index 3. myContainer.size() is now 3. Di2015NewLine2.) i = 2, someConditionIsMet is false, so we do nothing.Di2015NewLine3.) i = 1, someConditionIsMet is true, so we remove myContainer at index 1. myContainer.size() is now 2. Di2015NewLine4.) i = 0, someConditionIsMet is false, so we do nothing.Di2015NewLine
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorsomeConditionIsMet
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<entries> entriesToRemove = new List<entries>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach(entry in myContainer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( someConditionIsMet )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        entriesToRemove.Add(entry);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor ( int i = entriesToRemove.size() - 1; i > 0; --i )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    myContainer.Remove(entriesToRemove[i]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineentriesToRemove.clear();Di2015NewLine
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor
9586824Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor ( int i = 0; i < myContainer.size(); ++i )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( someConditionIsMet )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myContainer.Remove(i);Di2015NewLine        --i;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine1.) i = 0, someConditionIsMet is false, so we do nothing.Di2015NewLine2.) i = 1, someConditionIsMet is true, so we remove myContainer at index 1. myContainer.size() is now 3. We decrement i by 1, so it's now 0 again but will be 1 on the next iteration because of the ++i in the for loop.Di2015NewLine3.) i = 1, someConditionIsMet is false, so we do nothing.Di2015NewLine4.) i = 2, someConditionIsMet is true, so we remove myContainer at index 2. myContainer.size() is now 2. We decrement i by 1, so it's now 1 again but will be 2 on the next iteration because of the ++i in the for loop so we will not loop again because 2 is not less than myContainer.size(), which is now 2.Di2015NewLine

9586969Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate procedure [GetPageID]Di2015NewLine  @SpaceRequested intDi2015NewLineasDi2015NewLinebegin Di2015NewLine  set nocount on;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  begin tran;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  update top (1) pagesDi2015NewLine  setDi2015NewLine    SpaceAvailable -= @SpaceRequested,Di2015NewLine    SpaceOccupied += @SpaceRequestedDi2015NewLine  outputDi2015NewLine    inserted.PageIDDi2015NewLine  whereDi2015NewLine    SpaceAvailable > @SpaceRequestedDi2015NewLine  order by PageID asc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  commit tran;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine
9586969Di2015UniqueSeparatorcreate procedure [GetPageID]Di2015NewLine  @SpaceRequested intDi2015NewLineasDi2015NewLinebegin Di2015NewLine  set nocount on;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  begin tran;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  declare @page_id int;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  select top (1) @page_id = PageIDDi2015NewLine  from pages with (updlock, rowlock)Di2015NewLine  where SpaceAvailable > @SpaceRequestedDi2015NewLine  order by PageID asc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  update PagesDi2015NewLine  setDi2015NewLine    SpaceAvailable = SpaceAvailable - @SpaceRequested,Di2015NewLine    SpaceOccupied = SpaceOccupied + @SpaceRequestedDi2015NewLine  whereDi2015NewLine    PageID = @page_id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  commit tran;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  select @page_id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Initialize the form.Di2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Dock = DockStyle.Fill;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine DockStyle.Top;Di2015NewLine        panel.AutoSize = true;Di2015NewLine        panel.Controls.AddRange(new Control[] { reloadButton, submitButton });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine updating demo";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Form1_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Bind the DataGridView to the BindingSourceDi2015NewLine        // and load the data from the database.Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.DataSource = bindingSource1;Di2015NewLine        GetData("select * from Customers");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void reloadButton_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Reload the data from the database.Di2015NewLine        GetData(dataAdapter.SelectCommand.CommandText);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void submitButton_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Update the database with the user's changes.Di2015NewLine        dataAdapter.Update((DataTable)bindingSource1.DataSource);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void GetData(string selectCommand)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Specify a connection string. Replace the given value with a Di2015NewLine            // valid connection string for a Northwind SQL Server sampleDi2015NewLine            // database accessible to your system.Di2015NewLine            String connectionString =Di2015NewLine                "Integrated Security=SSPI;Persist Security Info=False;" +Di2015NewLine                "Initial Catalog=Northwind;Data Source=localhost";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a new data adapter based on the specified query.Di2015NewLine            dataAdapter = new SqlDataAdapter(selectCommand, connectionString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a command builder to generate SQL update, insert, andDi2015NewLine            // delete commands based on selectCommand. These are used toDi2015NewLine            // update the database.Di2015NewLine            SqlCommandBuilder commandBuilder = new SqlCommandBuilder(dataAdapter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Populate a new data table and bind it to the BindingSource.Di2015NewLine            DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine            table.Locale = System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLine            dataAdapter.Fill(table);Di2015NewLine            bindingSource1.DataSource = table;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Resize the DataGridView columns to fit the newly loaded content.Di2015NewLine            dataGridView1.AutoResizeColumns( Di2015NewLine                DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnsMode.AllCellsExceptHeader);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (SqlException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("To run this example, replace the value of the " +Di2015NewLine                "connectionString variable with a connection string that is " +Di2015NewLine                "valid for your system.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9588640Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string CustomReplace(string text, string oldValue, string newValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string done = text.Replace(oldValue, newValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var wildcard in Wildcards)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        builder.AppendFormat("({0}|{1})|", Regex.Escape(wildcard.Usage),Di2015NewLine            Regex.Escape(wildcard.Escape));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    builder.Length = builder.Length - 1; // Remove the last '|' characterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Regex.Replace(done, builder.ToString(), WildcardEvaluator);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string WildcardEvaluator(Match match)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var wildcard = Wildcards.Find(w => w.Usage == match.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (wildcard != null)Di2015NewLine        return wildcard.Value;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return match.Value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9589960Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int SECOND = 1;Di2015NewLineconst int MINUTE = 60 * SECOND;Di2015NewLineconst int HOUR = 60 * MINUTE;Di2015NewLineconst int DAY = 24 * HOUR;Di2015NewLineconst int MONTH = 30 * DAY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (delta < 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "not yet";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 1 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Seconds == 1 ? "one second ago" : ts.Seconds + " seconds ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 2 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "a minute ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 45 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Minutes + " minutes ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 90 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "an hour ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 24 * HOUR)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Hours + " hours ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 48 * HOUR)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "yesterday";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 30 * DAY)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Days + " days ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 12 * MONTH)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int months = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Floor((double)ts.Days / 30));Di2015NewLine  return months <= 1 ? "one month ago" : months + " months ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int years = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Floor((double)ts.Days / 365));Di2015NewLine  return years <= 1 ? "one year ago" : years + " years ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

      // pointer to shared memoryDi2015NewLineconst int   SHARED_MEM_SIZE = sizeof(ULONGLONG);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBOOL CreateSharedMem()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a named file mapping objectDi2015NewLine    hMappedFileObject = CreateFileMapping(Di2015NewLine                            INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE,Di2015NewLine                            NULL,Di2015NewLine                            PAGE_READWRITE,Di2015NewLine                            0,Di2015NewLine                            SHARED_MEM_SIZE,Di2015NewLine                            TEXT("shmemfile") // Name of shared mem fileDi2015NewLine                        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hMappedFileObject == NULL) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return FALSE;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BOOL bFirstInit = (ERROR_ALREADY_EXISTS != GetLastError());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get a ptr to the shared memoryDi2015NewLine    lpvSharedMem = MapViewOfFile( hMappedFileObject, FILE_MAP_WRITE, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (lpvSharedMem == NULL) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return FALSE; 9595629Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IPresentationEventArgs { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class PresentationEvent<TPresentationEventArgs> where TPresentationEventArgs : IPresentationEventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<Action<TPresentationEventArgs>> _subscribers = new List<Action<TPresentationEventArgs>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Subscribe(Action<TPresentationEventArgs> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _subscribers.Add(action);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Publish(TPresentationEventArgs message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var sub in _subscribers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sub.Invoke(message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MessageChangedEventArgs : IPresentationEventArgs Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Message { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MessageChangedEvent : PresentationEvent<MessageChangedEventArgs>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class EventBusDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<Type, Func<Object>> _mapping = new Dictionary<Type, Func<Object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static T GetPresentationEvent<T, TArgs>()Di2015NewLine        where T : PresentationEvent<TArgs>, new()Di2015NewLine        where TArgs : IPresentationEventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_mapping.ContainsKey(typeof(T)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _mapping[typeof(T)]() as T;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var presEvent = new T();Di2015NewLine        _mapping.Add(typeof(T), () => presEvent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return presEvent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Subscribe<T, TArgs>(Action<TArgs> action) where T : PresentationEvent<TArgs>, new()Di2015NewLine        where TArgs : IPresentationEventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var presEvent = GetPresentationEvent<T, TArgs>();Di2015NewLine        presEvent.Subscribe(action);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Publish<T, TArgs>(TArgs args) where T : PresentationEvent<TArgs>, new()Di2015NewLine        where TArgs : IPresentationEventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var presEvent = GetPresentationEvent<T, TArgs>();Di2015NewLine        presEvent.Publish(args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9601060Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class RouterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private class FrameDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public Frame(Node node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Node = node;Di2015NewLine      NextChild = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal Node Node { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    internal int NextChild { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  ///  Finds a (but not necessarily the shortest) route from <paramref name="source" /> Di2015NewLine  ///  to <paramref name="destination" />.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="source"> Source node </param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="destination"> Destination node </param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns> A list of nodes that represents the path from Di2015NewLine  ///  <paramref name="source" /> to <paramref name="destination" /> , including both Di2015NewLine  ///  <paramref name="source" /> and <paramref name="destination" /> . If no such path Di2015NewLine  ///  exists, <c>null</c> is returned. Di2015NewLine  /// </returns>Di2015NewLine  public static IList<Node> FindFirstRoute(Node source, Node destination)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var visited = new HashSet<Node>();Di2015NewLine    var path = new Stack<Frame>();Di2015NewLine    path.Push(new Frame(source));Di2015NewLine    var frame = path.Peek();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (frame != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (frame.Node == destination)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        return path.Select(x => x.Node).Reverse().ToList();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if (!visited.Add(frame.Node) || !DescendToNextChild(path, out frame))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        frame = Backtrack(path);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  ///   Attempts to move to the next child of the node on top of the stack.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="path"> Current path </param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="nextFrame"> Receives the new top frame in the path. If all children Di2015NewLine  ///  have already been explored, <paramref name="nextFrame" /> is set to <c>null</c> Di2015NewLine  /// </param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns> <c>true</c> if descending was successful, that is, if the current top Di2015NewLine  /// frame has any unexplored children left; otherwise, <c>false</c>. Di2015NewLine  /// </returns>Di2015NewLine  private static bool DescendToNextChild(Stack<Frame> path, out Frame nextFrame)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var topFrame = path.Peek();Di2015NewLine    var children = topFrame.Node.Children;Di2015NewLine    if (children != null && children.Length > topFrame.NextChild)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var child = children[topFrame.NextChild++];Di2015NewLine      path.Push(nextFrame = new Frame(child));Di2015NewLine      return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    nextFrame = null;Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  ///   Backtracks from the path until a frame is found where there is an unexplored Di2015NewLine  ///   child left if such a frame exists.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="path"> The path to backtrack from. </param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns> Di2015NewLine  ///  The next frame to investigate, which is represents the first unexplored Di2015NewLine  ///  child of the node closest to the top of the stack which has any unexplored Di2015NewLine  ///  children left. If no such a frame exists <c>null</c> is returned and the search Di2015NewLine  ///  should be stopped. Di2015NewLine  /// </returns>Di2015NewLine  private static Frame Backtrack(Stack<Frame> path)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Frame nextFrame = null;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      path.Pop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (path.Count > 0 && !DescendToNextChild(path, out nextFrame));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return nextFrame;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9601060Di2015UniqueSeparatorFrame.NextChild

9605015Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinterface IValue { string Value { get; } }Di2015NewLineinterface IParent : IValue { IChild Child { get; } }Di2015NewLineinterface IChild : IValue { IParent Parent { get; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class HasValue : IValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string value;Di2015NewLine    public HasValue(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get { return value; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesealed class GreenChild : HasValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public GreenChild(string value) : base(value) {}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesealed class GreenParent : HasValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private GreenChild child;Di2015NewLine    public GreenChild Child { get { return child; } }Di2015NewLine    public GreenParent(string value, GreenChild child) : base(value)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine         this.child = child; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IParent MakeFacade() { return new RedParent(this); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private sealed class RedParent : IParentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private GreenParent greenParent;Di2015NewLine        private RedChild redChild;Di2015NewLine        public RedParent(GreenParent parent) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            this.greenParent = parent; Di2015NewLine            this.redChild = new RedChild(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public IChild Child { get { return redChild; } }Di2015NewLine        public string Value { get { return greenParent.Value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private sealed class RedChild : IChildDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private RedParent redParent;Di2015NewLine            public RedChild(RedParent redParent)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.redParent = redParent;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public IParent Parent { get { return redParent; } }Di2015NewLine            public string Value Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                get Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    return redParent.greenParent.Child.Value; Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass PDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var greenChild1 = new GreenChild("child1");Di2015NewLine        var greenParent1 = new GreenParent("parent1", greenChild1);Di2015NewLine        var greenParent2 = new GreenParent("parent2", greenChild1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var redParent1 = greenParent1.MakeFacade();Di2015NewLine        var redParent2 = greenParent2.MakeFacade();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(redParent1.Value); // parent1Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(redParent1.Child.Parent.Value); // parent1 !Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(redParent2.Value); // parent2Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(redParent2.Child.Parent.Value); // parent2 !Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // See how that goes? RedParent1 and RedParent2 disagree on what theDi2015NewLine        // parent of greenChild1 is, **but they are self-consistent**. TheyDi2015NewLine        // always report that the parent of their child is themselves.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9606916Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Detach any existing rows with the same keys (if necessary), then attach to this object using the "*" ETagDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="newEntity"></param>Di2015NewLine        protected virtual void SafeAttach(TableServiceEntity newEntity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TableServiceEntity entity = GetExistingRow(newEntity.PartitionKey, newEntity.RowKey);Di2015NewLine            if(entity != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                base.Detach(entity);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            base.AttachTo("MY_TABLE_NAME_GOES_HERE", newEntity, "*");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private TableServiceEntity GetExistingRow(string partitionKey, string rowKey)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var query = (from e in base.EntitiesDi2015NewLine                         where e.Entity is TableServiceEntityDi2015NewLine                         && ((TableServiceEntity)e.Entity).RowKey == rowKeyDi2015NewLine                         && ((TableServiceEntity)e.Entity).PartitionKey == partitionKeyDi2015NewLine                         select (TableServiceEntity)e.Entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RetrierFunctionResult<TableServiceEntity> r = StorageOperationRetrier.Execute(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return query.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return r.Result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9607524Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PCDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public List<Processor> Processor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ConstructorDi2015NewLine    public PC()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Processor = new List<Processor>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Method to get all info sequentiallyDi2015NewLine    public void GetAllInfo()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // These temporary stores fetch WMI data as ManagementObjectsDi2015NewLine        // Most cases will only need one WMI class.Di2015NewLine        ManagementObject[] WMIDataTemp1;Di2015NewLine        ManagementObject[] WMIDataTemp2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WMIDataTemp1 = DataRetriever.GetWMIData("Win32_Processor");Di2015NewLine        foreach (ManagementObject Object in WMIDataTemp1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Processor.Add(new Processor(Object));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RefreshAll()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Delete the lists and start againDi2015NewLine        // Another option would be to foreach through the list elements and initialise each object again.Di2015NewLine        this.Processor.Clear();Di2015NewLine        GetAllInfo();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RefreshVolatileData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Extra function that will do some cool stuff later.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9607524Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProcessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Define propertiesDi2015NewLine    public string Architecture = "N/A";Di2015NewLine    public string Availability = "N/A";Di2015NewLine    public UInt32 CacheL2 = 0;Di2015NewLine    public UInt32 CacheL3 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Overloaded constructor methodDi2015NewLine    // The one with no arguments does nothing to initialise the classDi2015NewLine    // The one with the ManagementObject argument will call GetInfo to arrange the held data into the properties aboveDi2015NewLine    public Processor() { }Di2015NewLine    public Processor(ManagementObject wmiProcessor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.GetInfo(wmiProcessor);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The main information handler for the classes.Di2015NewLine    // This splits out the data in the ManagementObject into the class's own propertiesDi2015NewLine    public void GetInfo(ManagementObject wmiProcessor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If anything fails, the try loop will just end without making a fussDi2015NewLine        // Because of the default values, N/A will be displayed everywhere if something fails here.Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Architecture = (string)wmiProcessor["Architecture"];Di2015NewLine            this.Availability = (string)wmiProcessor["Availability"];Di2015NewLine            this.CacheL2 = (UInt32)wmiProcessor["L2CacheSize"];Di2015NewLine            this.CacheL3 = (UInt32)wmiProcessor["L3CacheSize"];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9620533Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic BigInteger Factorial(BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BigInteger f = 1;Di2015NewLine    for (BigInteger i = 2; i <= n; ++i)Di2015NewLine        f = f * i;Di2015NewLine    return f;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic BigInteger BinomialCoefficient(BigInteger n, BigInteger k)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Factorial(n) / (Factorial(n-k) * Factorial(k));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9620533Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic BigInteger BinomialCoefficient(BigInteger n, BigInteger k)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (n == 0) return 1;Di2015NewLine    if (k == 0) return 0;Di2015NewLine    return BinomialCoefficient(n-1, k-1) + BinomialCoefficient(n-1, k)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9620533Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic BigInteger BinomialCoefficient(BigInteger n, BigInteger k)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // (n C k) and (n C (n-k)) are the same, so pick the smaller as k:Di2015NewLine    if (k > n - k) k = n - k;Di2015NewLine    BigInteger result = 1;Di2015NewLine    for (BigInteger i = 1; i <= k; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result *= n - k + i;Di2015NewLine        result /= i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9622825Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected string GuessThumbnail(HtmlDocument document)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlNode root = document.DocumentNode;Di2015NewLine        HtmlNode description = root.SelectSingleNode(DescriptionPredictiveXPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (description != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // in this case, we predict relevant images are the ones closest to the description text node.Di2015NewLine            HtmlNode parent = description.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine            while (parent != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string path = string.Concat(parent.XPath, ImageXPath);Di2015NewLine                IList<HtmlNode> images = root.SelectNodesOrEmpty(path).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // find the image tag that's closest to the text node.Di2015NewLine                if (images.Any())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HtmlNode descriptionOutermost = description.ParentNodeUntil(parent); // get the first child towards the description from the parent node.Di2015NewLine                    int descriptionIndex = descriptionOutermost.GetIndex(); // get the index of the description's outermost element.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    HtmlNode closestToDescription = null;Di2015NewLine                    int distanceToDescription = int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (HtmlNode image in images)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int index = image.ParentNodeUntil(parent).GetIndex(); // get the index of the image's outermost element.Di2015NewLine                        if (index > descriptionIndex)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            index *= -1;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        int distance = descriptionIndex - index;Di2015NewLine                        if (distance < distanceToDescription)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            closestToDescription = image;Di2015NewLine                            distanceToDescription = distance;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (closestToDescription != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string source = closestToDescription.Attributes["src"].Value;Di2015NewLine                        return source;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                parent = parent.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // figure some other way to do itDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static HtmlNode ParentNodeUntil(this HtmlNode node, HtmlNode parent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (node.ParentNode != parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        node = node.ParentNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return node;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static int GetIndex(this HtmlNode node)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return node.ParentNode.ChildNodes.IndexOf(node);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9623352Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void panel1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int angle = 90;Di2015NewLine        Graphics g = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLine        Image i = new Bitmap(@"C:\\Jellyfish.jpg");Di2015NewLine        g.TranslateTransform((float)i.Width / 2, (float)i.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine        g.RotateTransform(angle);Di2015NewLine        g.TranslateTransform(-(float)i.Width / 2, -(float)i.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine        g.DrawImage(i, new Point(0,0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9623413Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string ProcessEnglishHebrewSentence(string sentence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ret = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        string[] words = sentence.Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var curHebrewList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        var curEnglishList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        bool curLangIsHebrew=false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(var w in words)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(IsHebrew(w) && curLangIsHebrew) // we have a word in Hebrew and the last word was in Hebrew tooDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                curHebrewList.Add(w);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if(IsHebrew(w) && !curLangIsHebrew) // we have a word in Hebrew and the last word was in EnglishDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(curEnglishList.Any())            {Di2015NewLine                    curEnglishList.Reverse();Di2015NewLine                    ret.AddRange(curEnglishList);Di2015NewLine                } // reverse current list of English words and add to ListDi2015NewLine                curEnglishList = new List<string>(); // create a new empty list for the next series of English wordsDi2015NewLine                curHebrewList.Add(w);Di2015NewLine                curLangIsHebrew=true; // set current language to HebrewDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if(!IsHebrew(w) && !curLangIsHebrew) // we have a word in English and the last word was in EnglishDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                curEnglishList.Add(new String(w.Reverse().ToArray())); // reverse and add it to the current series of English wordsDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if(!IsHebrew(w) && curLangIsHebrew) // we have a word in English and the last word was in HebrewDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(curHebrewList.Any()) ret.AddRange(curHebrewList); // add current list of Hebrew words to List of ListsDi2015NewLine                curHebrewList = new List<string>(); // create a new empty list for the next series of Hebrew wordsDi2015NewLine                curEnglishList.Add(new string(w.Reverse().ToArray()));Di2015NewLine                curLangIsHebrew=false; // set current language to EnglishDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("there should be no other case...");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(curHebrewList.Any()) ret.AddRange(curHebrewList);Di2015NewLine        if(curEnglishList.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            curEnglishList.Reverse();Di2015NewLine            ret.AddRange(curEnglishList);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ret.Aggregate((a,b) => a + " " + b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9626390Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static bool running, exit;Di2015NewLine        static int burst;Di2015NewLine        static long guidCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        static long[] counts = new long[256];Di2015NewLine        static DateTime nextReport = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        static readonly TimeSpan reportInterval = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WindowHeight = (int)(0.8 * Console.LargestWindowHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WriteLine(ConsoleColor.White, "X - Exit | P - Run/Pause | S - Step (hold for Slow) | B - Burst");Di2015NewLine            WriteLine("Press P, S or B to make something happen.", reportInterval);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Guid guid;Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var cursorPos = new CursorLocation();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (!exit)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Console.KeyAvailable)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ProcessKey(Console.ReadKey(true));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (running || burst > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    guid = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine                    bytes = guid.ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine                    ++guidCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var b = bytes[i];Di2015NewLine                        ++counts[b];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (burst > 0) --burst;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (burst == 0 && DateTime.Now > nextReport)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        cursorPos.MoveCursor();Di2015NewLine                        ReportFrequencies();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(20);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void ProcessKey(ConsoleKeyInfo keyInfo)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (keyInfo.Key)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case ConsoleKey.P:Di2015NewLine                    running = !running;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case ConsoleKey.B:Di2015NewLine                    burst = 100;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case ConsoleKey.S:Di2015NewLine                    burst = 1;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case ConsoleKey.X:Di2015NewLine                    exit = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void ReportFrequencies()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Write("\\r\\n{0} GUIDs generated. Frequencies (%):\\r\\n\\r\\n", guidCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const int itemWidth = 11;Di2015NewLine            const int colCount = 8; // Console.WindowWidth / (itemWidth + 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var f = (double)counts[i] / (16 * guidCount);Di2015NewLine                var c = GetFrequencyColor(f);Di2015NewLine                Write(c, RightAdjust(3, "{0:x}", i));Di2015NewLine                Write(c, " {0:0.00}".PadRight(itemWidth), f*100);Di2015NewLine                if ((i + 1) % colCount == 0) Write("\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            nextReport = DateTime.Now + reportInterval;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static ConsoleColor GetFrequencyColor(double f)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (f < 0.003) return ConsoleColor.DarkRed;Di2015NewLine            if (f < 0.004) return ConsoleColor.Green;Di2015NewLine            if (f < 0.005) return ConsoleColor.Yellow;Di2015NewLine            return ConsoleColor.White;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string RightAdjust(int w, string s, params object[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (args.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                s = string.Format(s, args);Di2015NewLine            return s.PadLeft(w);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region From my library, so I need not include that here...Di2015NewLine        class CursorLocationDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public int X, Y;Di2015NewLine            public CursorLocation()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                X = Console.CursorLeft;Di2015NewLine                Y = Console.CursorTop;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void MoveCursor()Di2015NewLine 9627179Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void IgnoreAllBut<TStructuralType>(Di2015NewLine    this StructuralTypeConfiguration<TStructuralType> configuration,Di2015NewLine    params Expression<Func<TStructuralType, object>>[] includes)Di2015NewLine    where TStructuralType : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var includeMembers = ConvertExpressionsToMembers(includes);Di2015NewLine    var type = typeof(TStructuralType);Di2015NewLine    var properties = type.GetProperties();Di2015NewLine    var typeParameter = Expression.Parameter(type);Di2015NewLine    var configurationType = configuration.GetType();Di2015NewLine    var ignoreMethod = configurationType.GetMethod("Ignore");Di2015NewLine    foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!includeMembers.Any(member => member.Name == property.Name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propertyExpression = Expression.Property(typeParameter, property);Di2015NewLine            var lambdaExpression = Expression.Lambda(propertyExpression, typeParameter);Di2015NewLine            var genericIgnoreMethod = ignoreMethod.MakeGenericMethod(property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            var parameters = new object[] { lambdaExpression };Di2015NewLine            genericIgnoreMethod.Invoke(configuration, parameters);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static List<MemberInfo> ConvertExpressionsToMembers<TStructuralType>(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TStructuralType, object>>[] expressions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var members = new List<MemberInfo>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var lambda in expressions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var expression = lambda.Body;Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (memberExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = expression as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = unaryExpression.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        members.Add(memberExpression.Member);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return members;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9628940Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Truncate(string file, int lines)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream fs = File.Open(file, FileMode.OpenOrCreate, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fs.Position = fs.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // \\n \\r\\n (both uses \\n for lines)Di2015NewLine        const int BUFFER_SIZE = 2048;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start at the end until # lines have been encountered, record the position, then truncate the fileDi2015NewLine        long currentPosition = fs.Position;Di2015NewLine        int linesProcessed = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[BUFFER_SIZE];Di2015NewLine        while (linesProcessed < linesToTruncate && currentPosition > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead = FillBuffer(buffer, fs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // We now have a buffer containing the later contents of the fileDi2015NewLine            for (int i = bytesRead - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 currentPosition--;Di2015NewLine                 if (buffer[i] == '\\n')Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     linesProcessed++;Di2015NewLine                     if (linesProcessed == linesToTruncate)Di2015NewLine                         break;Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Truncate the fileDi2015NewLine        fs.SetLength(currentPosition);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int FillBuffer(byte[] buffer, FileStream fs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (fs.Position == 0)Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine    int currentByteOffset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate how many bytes of the buffer can be filled (remember that we're going in reverse)Di2015NewLine    long expectedBytesToRead = (fs.Position < buffer.Length) ? fs.Position : buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine    fs.Position -= expectedBytesToRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (bytesRead < expectedBytesToRead)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bytesRead += fs.Read(buffer, currentByteOffset, buffer.Length - bytesRead);Di2015NewLine        currentByteOffset += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We have to reset the position again because we moved the reader forward;Di2015NewLine    fs.Position -= bytesRead;Di2015NewLine    return bytesRead;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9629039Di2015UniqueSeparator*.*
9629039Di2015UniqueSeparator.*
9629039Di2015UniqueSeparatorhttp://.*\\.website\\b.*\\.com/.*/pages/PAGE[12](\\?[^=]+=[^&=]+(&[^=]+=[^=&]+)*)?Di2015NewLine
9629039Di2015UniqueSeparatorhttp://      # just http://Di2015NewLine.*\\.         # any thing, just make sure it's followed by '.'Di2015NewLinewebsite\\b    # website, the whole wordDi2015NewLine.*\\.com      # anything between website and .comDi2015NewLine/.*/pages/   # anything between the .com and the pagesDi2015NewLinePAGE[12]     # PAGE1 or PAGE2Di2015NewLine(\\?          # opening bracket and '?' (query string)Di2015NewLine[^=]+        # the key: i've said it can't include =Di2015NewLine=            # =Di2015NewLine[^=&]+       # the value: i've said it can't include = or &Di2015NewLine(&           # opening bracket and '&' for next part of query stringDi2015NewLine[^=]+=[^=&]+ # key=value pair, same regex as beforeDi2015NewLine)*           # 0 or more of these (the &key=value)Di2015NewLine)?           # the entire query string is optional.Di2015NewLine
9629039Di2015UniqueSeparator&

9629246Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask[] tasks = null;Di2015NewLinefor(int i = 0 ; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     //automatically create an async task and execute it using ThreadPool's threadDi2015NewLine     tasks[i] = Task.StartNew([address of function/lambda expression]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Wait for all task to completeDi2015NewLine    Task.WaitAll(tasks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (AggregateException ae)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //handle aggregate exception hereDi2015NewLine    //it will be raised if one or more task throws exception and all the exceptions from defaulting task get accumulated in this exception objectDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//continue your processing furtherDi2015NewLine

9632761Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CheckEmailAddressAttribute : ActionFilterAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuting(ActionExecutingContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = filterContext.HttpContext.Request;Di2015NewLine        // if the cookie isn't set the a user never provided their detailsDi2015NewLine        if (request.Cookies["mycookiename"] == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Set it to the correct result, to redirect the user to provide their email addressDi2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new ViewResult { ViewName = "GetEmailAddress" };Di2015NewLine            filterContext.HttpContext.Response.AppendCookie(new HttpCookie("mycookiename", "true"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Don't do anything, the user already provided their email addressDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9635467Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// List of locations around given location. 9635589Di2015UniqueSeparator    public enum Log4NetConfigItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LOGLEVELDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public const string LOG4NET_CONFIGFILE = "log4net.config";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void UpdateConfiguration(Log4NetConfigItem which, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Load the config file.Di2015NewLine        XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        doc.Load(LOG4NET_CONFIGFILE);Di2015NewLine        // Create an XPath navigator for the document.Di2015NewLine        XPathNavigator nav = doc.CreateNavigator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XPathExpression expr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Compile the correct XPath expression for the element we want to configure.Di2015NewLine            switch (which)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                case Log4NetConfigItem.LOGLEVEL:Di2015NewLine                    // Compile a standard XPath expressionDi2015NewLine                    expr = nav.Compile("/configuration/log4net/logger/level");Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Locate the node(s) defined by the XPath expression.Di2015NewLine            XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select(expr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Iterate on the node setDi2015NewLine            while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                XPathNavigator nav2 = iterator.Current.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Update the element as required.Di2015NewLine                switch (which)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                    case Log4NetConfigItem.LOGLEVEL:Di2015NewLine                        // Update the 'value' attribute for the log level.Di2015NewLine                        SetAttribute(nav2, String.Empty, "value", nav.NamespaceURI, value.ToString());Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Save the modified config file.Di2015NewLine            doc.Save(LOG4NET_CONFIGFILE);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void SetAttribute(System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator, String prefix, String localName, String namespaceURI, String value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (navigator.CanEdit == true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check if given localName existDi2015NewLine            if (navigator.MoveToAttribute(localName, namespaceURI))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Exist, so set current attribute with new value.Di2015NewLine                navigator.SetValue(value);Di2015NewLine                // Move navigator back to beginning of nodeDi2015NewLine                navigator.MoveToParent();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Does not exist, create the new attributeDi2015NewLine                navigator.CreateAttribute(prefix, localName, namespaceURI, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9635849Di2015UniqueSeparator    static IEnumerable<string> GetVariations(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] indexes = new int[s.Length];Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (IncrementIndexes(indexes, s.Length))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Clear();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < indexes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (indexes[i] != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(s[indexes[i]-1]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            yield return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool IncrementIndexes(int[] indexes, int limit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < indexes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            indexes[i]++;Di2015NewLine            if (indexes[i] > limit)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                indexes[i] = 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9636633Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RemoveDuplicates(DataTable table, List<string> keyColumns)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, string> uniquenessDict = new Dictionary<string, string>(table.Rows.Count);Di2015NewLine    System.Text.StringBuilder sb = null;Di2015NewLine    int rowIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    DataRow row;Di2015NewLine    DataRowCollection rows = table.Rows;Di2015NewLine    while (rowIndex < rows.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        row = rows[rowIndex];Di2015NewLine        sb = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string colname in keyColumns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(((string)row[colname]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (uniquenessDict.ContainsKey(sb.ToString()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rows.Remove(row);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uniquenessDict.Add(sb.ToString(), string.Empty);Di2015NewLine            rowIndex++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9639326Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Configuration;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.Security;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.WebControls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web.UI.HtmlControls;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLinepublic partial class upload : System.Web.UI.PageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        string filePath = Server.MapPath(Request.QueryString["ax-file-path"]);Di2015NewLine        string allowExtstr  = Request.QueryString["ax-allow-ext"];Di2015NewLine        string[] allowExt   = allowExtstr.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!System.IO.File.Exists(filePath) && filePath.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory(filePath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!System.IO.File.Exists(thumbPath) && thumbPath.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory(thumbPath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(Request.Files.Count>0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Request.Files.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HttpPostedFile file = Request.Files[i];Di2015NewLine                string fullPath = checkFilename(file.FileName, allowExt, filePath);Di2015NewLine                file.SaveAs(fullPath);Di2015NewLine                Response.Write(@"{""name"":"""+System.IO.Path.GetFileName(fullPath)+@""",""size"":""0"",""status"":""uploaded"",""info"":""File/chunk uploaded""}");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string checkFilename(string filename, string[] allowExt, string filePath)Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            string[] windowsReserved    = new string[] {"CON", "PRN", "AUX", "NUL","COM1", "COM2", "COM3", "COM4", "COM5", "COM6", "COM7", "COM8", "COM9",Di2015NewLine                                    "LPT1", "LPT2", "LPT3", "LPT4", "LPT5", "LPT6", "LPT7", "LPT8", "LPT9"};    Di2015NewLine            string[] badWinChars        = new string[] {"<", ">", ":", @"\\", "/", "|", "?", "*"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < badWinChars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                filename.Replace(badWinChars[i], "");        Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            string fileExt      = System.IO.Path.GetExtension(filename);Di2015NewLine            fileExt = fileExt.Replace(".", "");Di2015NewLine            string fileBase     = System.IO.Path.GetFileName(filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //check if legal windows file nameDi2015NewLine            if(Array.IndexOf(windowsReserved, fileBase)>=0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Response.Write(@"{""name"":"""+fileBase+@""",""size"":""0"",""status"":""error"",""info"":""File name not allowed. Windows reserverd.""}");Di2015NewLine                return "error";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //check if is allowed extensionDi2015NewLine            if (Array.IndexOf(allowExt, fileExt) < 0 && allowExt.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (allowExt.Length != 1 || !String.Equals(allowExt[0], ""))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Response.Write(@"{""name"":""" + fileBase + @""",""size"":" + allowExt[0] + @",""status"":""error"",""info"":""Extension " + fileExt + @" not allowed.""}");Di2015NewLine                    return "error";Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string fullPath = filePath+fileBase;Di2015NewLine            int c=0;Di2015NewLine            while(System.IO.File.Exists(fullPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                c++;Di2015NewLine                fileBase= fileBase+"("+c.ToString()+")."+fileExt;Di2015NewLine                fullPath    = filePath+fileBase;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return fullPath;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9646577Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BackgroundJobDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event Action<object, int> StepCompleted;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int TotalSteps = 10;Di2015NewLine        for (int step = 1; step <= TotalSteps; step++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Execute some heavy work here.Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Calculate percentage (0..100).Di2015NewLine            int percentage = (int)(step * 100.0 / TotalSteps);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Notify the subscribers that the step has been completed.Di2015NewLine            OnStepCompleted(percentage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnStepCompleted(int percentage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (StepCompleted != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StepCompleted(this, percentage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9651819Di2015UniqueSeparator   public class CokeMachine {Di2015NewLine     Button Coke;Di2015NewLine     Button 7Up;Di2015NewLine     Button RootBeer;Di2015NewLine     TextBox MoneySlot;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     double CokeCost = .75;Di2015NewLine     double 7UpCost = .65;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // "wiring up" the coke button click event to it's handler.Di2015NewLine     // We do this in C# by declaring an new EventHandler object (a .NET framework supplied class)Di2015NewLine     // and we pass in the name of our method as a parameter.Di2015NewLine     // This new EventHandler is *added* to the button's click event.Di2015NewLine     // An event can have multiple handlers, that's why we do "+="Di2015NewLine     // instead of just "=". 9654449Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<IObservable<TResult>> ToAsync<TResult>(this Func<TResult> function, IScheduler scheduler) {Di2015NewLine    if (function != null) {Di2015NewLine        if (scheduler != null) {Di2015NewLine            return () => {Di2015NewLine                AsyncSubject<TResult> asyncSubject = new AsyncSubject<TResult>();Di2015NewLine                scheduler.Schedule(() => {Di2015NewLine                    TResult result = default(TResult);Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLine                        result = function();Di2015NewLine                    } catch (Exception exception1) {Di2015NewLine                        Exception exception = exception1;Di2015NewLine                        asyncSubject.OnError(exception);Di2015NewLine                        return;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    asyncSubject.OnNext(result);Di2015NewLine                    asyncSubject.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine                return asyncSubject.AsObservable<TResult>();Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("scheduler");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("function");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9658183Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE dbo.AddUserAndGroupDi2015NewLine  @username   NVARCHAR(255),Di2015NewLine  @email      VARCHAR(320),Di2015NewLine  @firstname  NVARCHAR(32),Di2015NewLine  @secondName NVARCHAR(32)Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine  SET NOCOUNT ON;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  DECLARE @UserID INT, @GroupID INT;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  INSERT dbo.Users(Username, Email, FirstName, SecondName)Di2015NewLine    SELECT @username, @email, @firstname, @secondname;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SELECT @UserID = SCOPE_IDENTITY();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  -- could probably simply rest with OUTPUT, just keeping it simple/consistentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  INSERT dbo.Groups(GroupName) SELECT @username;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SELECT @GroupID = SCOPE_IDENTITY();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  INSERT dbo.Membership(UserID, GroupID) SELECT @UserID, @GroupID;Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine

9658378Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<List<T>> PowerSet<T>(List<T> startingSet, int minSubsetSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<List<T>> subsetList = new List<List<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //The set bits of each intermediate value represent unique Di2015NewLine    //combinations from the startingSet.Di2015NewLine    //We can start checking for combinations at (1<<minSubsetSize)-1 sinceDi2015NewLine    //values less than that will not yield large enough subsets.Di2015NewLine    int iLimit = 1 << startingSet.Count;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = (1 << minSubsetSize)-1; i < iLimit; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Get the number of 1's in this 'i'Di2015NewLine        int setBitCount = NumberOfSetBits(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Only include this subset if it will have at least minSubsetSize members.Di2015NewLine        if (setBitCount >= minSubsetSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<T> subset = new List<T>(setBitCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < startingSet.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //If the j'th bit in i is set, Di2015NewLine                //then add the j'th element of the startingSet to this subset.Di2015NewLine                if ((i & (1 << j)) != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    subset.Add(startingSet[j]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            subsetList.Add(subset);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return subsetList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9658378Di2015UniqueSeparatori
9658378Di2015UniqueSeparatorNumberOfSetBits
9658378Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int NumberOfSetBits(int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    i = i - ((i >> 1) & 0x55555555);Di2015NewLine    i = (i & 0x33333333) + ((i >> 2) & 0x33333333);Di2015NewLine    return (((i + (i >> 4)) & 0x0F0F0F0F) * 0x01010101) >> 24;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9658378Di2015UniqueSeparatorstartingSet
9658378Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<List<T>> PowerSet<T>(List<T> startingSet, int minSubsetSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var startingSetIndexes = Enumerable.Range(0, startingSet.Count).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var candidates = Enumerable.Range((1 << minSubsetSize)-1, 1 << startingSet.Count)Di2015NewLine                               .Where(p => NumberOfSetBits(p) >= minSubsetSize)Di2015NewLine                               .ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (int p in candidates)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return startingSetIndexes.Where(setInd => (p & (1 << setInd)) != 0)Di2015NewLine                                       .Select(setInd => startingSet[setInd])Di2015NewLine                                       .ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9658566Di2015UniqueSeparatorTexture2D texture = /*copy the texture you want to change*/;Di2015NewLinePixel pixel;/*note it's really inexact, so don't mind it, the idea is to show how it would be done*/Di2015NewLinefor(int i=0; i<texture.width; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  for(int j=0; j<texture.height; j++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    pixel = texture.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLine    if(pixel.Color.A==1)Di2015NewLine      pixel.Color = Color.White;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9658583Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<IX> Filter(Func<IX, bool> filterFunc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Func<X, bool> newFilter = x => filterFunc(x);Di2015NewLine    return Filter(newFilter).Cast<IX>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

        Tuple<Char, int> charInfo = Grid[word[index]];Di2015NewLine            int Pos = charInfo.Item2;Di2015NewLine            int clickTime = Pos * MIN_DURATION;Di2015NewLine            if (index                 clickTime += WAIT_DURATION;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            totalMillis += clickTime;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return totalMillis;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9659326Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main() Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string before = "xyz @ abc@123";Di2015NewLine        string after = CustomRemove(before);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(after); // Prints xyzabc@123Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static string CustomRemove(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int atSignIndex = text.IndexOf(" @ ");Di2015NewLine        while (atSignIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            text = text.Remove(atSignIndex, 3);Di2015NewLine            atSignIndex = text.IndexOf(" @ ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
