9661082Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate delegate object CreateObject();Di2015NewLineprivate delegate Rectangle CreateRectangle();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine(new Rectangle());Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine  TryCreateDelegate<CreateObject>(BuildDynamicMethod_Boxed());Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine  TryCreateDelegate<CreateRectangle>(BuildDynamicMethod());Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static DynamicMethod BuildDynamicMethod_Boxed()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var TRect = typeof(Rectangle);Di2015NewLine  var dm = new DynamicMethod("buildNewRectangle", typeof(object), Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine  var il = dm.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloca_S, il.DeclareLocal(TRect));Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Initobj, TRect);Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc_0);      Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Box, TRect);Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLine  return dm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static DynamicMethod BuildDynamicMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var TRect = typeof(Rectangle);Di2015NewLine  var dm = new DynamicMethod("buildNewRectangle", TRect, Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLine  var il = dm.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloca_S, il.DeclareLocal(TRect));Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Initobj, TRect);Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc_0);Di2015NewLine  il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLine  return dm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void TryCreateDelegate<T>(DynamicMethod dm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var co = dm.CreateDelegate(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    var value = co.DynamicInvoke();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    var indent = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (ex.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      indent++;Di2015NewLine      ex = ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(new string('\\t', indent) + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9663199Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> BuildOrderBys<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine        params SortDescription[] properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (properties == null || properties.Length == 0) return source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var typeOfT = typeof (T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type t = typeOfT;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IOrderedEnumerable<T> result = null;Di2015NewLine        var thenBy = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in propertiesDi2015NewLine            .Select(prop => new {PropertyInfo = t.GetProperty(prop.PropertyName), prop.Direction}))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var oExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeOfT, "o");Di2015NewLine            var propertyInfo = item.PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine            var propertyType = propertyInfo.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine            var isAscending = item.Direction == ListSortDirection.Ascending;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (thenBy)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prevExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof (IOrderedEnumerable<T>), "prevExpr");Di2015NewLine                var expr1 = Expression.Lambda<Func<IOrderedEnumerable<T>, IOrderedEnumerable<T>>>(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                        (isAscending ? thenByMethod : thenByDescendingMethod).MakeGenericMethod(typeOfT, propertyType),Di2015NewLine                        prevExpr,Di2015NewLine                        Expression.Lambda(Di2015NewLine                            typeof (Func<,>).MakeGenericType(typeOfT, propertyType),Di2015NewLine                            Expression.MakeMemberAccess(oExpr, propertyInfo),Di2015NewLine                            oExpr)Di2015NewLine                        ),Di2015NewLine                    prevExpr)Di2015NewLine                    .Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result = expr1(result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prevExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof (IEnumerable<T>), "prevExpr");Di2015NewLine                var expr1 = Expression.Lambda<Func<IEnumerable<T>, IOrderedEnumerable<T>>>(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                        (isAscending ? orderByMethod : orderByDescendingMethod).MakeGenericMethod(typeOfT, propertyType),Di2015NewLine                        prevExpr,Di2015NewLine                        Expression.Lambda(Di2015NewLine                            typeof (Func<,>).MakeGenericType(typeOfT, propertyType),Di2015NewLine                            Expression.MakeMemberAccess(oExpr, propertyInfo),Di2015NewLine                            oExpr)Di2015NewLine                        ),Di2015NewLine                    prevExpr)Di2015NewLine                    .Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result = expr1(source);Di2015NewLine                thenBy = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo orderByMethod =Di2015NewLine        MethodOf(() => Enumerable.OrderBy(default(IEnumerable<object>), default(Func<object, object>)))Di2015NewLine            .GetGenericMethodDefinition();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo orderByDescendingMethod =Di2015NewLine        MethodOf(() => Enumerable.OrderByDescending(default(IEnumerable<object>), default(Func<object, object>)))Di2015NewLine            .GetGenericMethodDefinition();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo thenByMethod =Di2015NewLine        MethodOf(() => Enumerable.ThenBy(default(IOrderedEnumerable<object>), default(Func<object, object>)))Di2015NewLine            .GetGenericMethodDefinition();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MethodInfo thenByDescendingMethod =Di2015NewLine        MethodOf(() => Enumerable.ThenByDescending(default(IOrderedEnumerable<object>), default(Func<object, object>)))Di2015NewLine            .GetGenericMethodDefinition();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static MethodInfo MethodOf<T>(Expression<Func<T>> method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodCallExpression mce = (MethodCallExpression) method.Body;Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo mi = mce.Method;Di2015NewLine        return mi;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class SampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var data = new List<Customer>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          new Customer {ID = 3, Name = "a"},Di2015NewLine          new Customer {ID = 3, Name = "c"},Di2015NewLine 9663413Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // read parameters from commandline - first one is file name, second is size in kbDi2015NewLine        // so call this with  C:\\> CreateFile (name of file) (size in kb)Di2015NewLine        string fileName = args[0];Di2015NewLine        int sizeInKB = Convert.ToInt32(args[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Creating file '{0}' with a size of {1} kb....", fileName, sizeInKB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // open a file stream to create the fileDi2015NewLine        using (FileStream fstm = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // allocate 1 kb bufferDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // write as many 1kb buffers to file as requiredDi2015NewLine            for (int index = 0; index < sizeInKB; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fstm.Write(buffer, 0, 1024);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // close file streamDi2015NewLine            fstm.Flush();Di2015NewLine            fstm.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Successfully created file - we're done...");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9669047Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string createPermalink(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    text = text.ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(text.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We want to skip the first hyphenable characters and go to the "meat" of the stringDi2015NewLine    bool lastHyphen = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // You can enumerate directly a stringDi2015NewLine    foreach (char c in text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (char.IsLetterOrDigit(c))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            lastHyphen = false;Di2015NewLine        }       Di2015NewLine        else if (!lastHyphen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We use lastHyphen to not put two hyphens consecutivelyDi2015NewLine            sb.Append('-');Di2015NewLine            lastHyphen = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (sb.Length == 200)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Remove the last hyphenDi2015NewLine    if (sb.Length > 0 && sb[sb.Length - 1] == '-')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Length--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9669047Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegex rgx = new Regex(@"^\\W+|\\W+$");    Di2015NewLineRegex rgx2 = new Regex(@"\\W+"); Di2015NewLinereturn rgx2.Replace(rgx.Replace(text.ToLower(), string.Empty), "-");Di2015NewLine

9674731Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int[,] LoadData(string inputFilePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int[,] data = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (File.Exists(inputFilePath))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, int> counts = GetRowAndColumnCounts(inputFilePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int rowCount = counts["row_count"];Di2015NewLine    int columnCount = counts["column_count"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    data = new int[rowCount, columnCount];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (StreamReader sr = File.OpenText(inputFilePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string s = "";Di2015NewLine      string[] split = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; (s = sr.ReadLine()) != null; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        split = s.Split(new char[] { ',' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < columnCount; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          data[i, j] = int.Parse(split[j]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    throw new FileDoesNotExistException("Input file does not exist");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return data;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Dictionary<string, int> GetRowAndColumnCounts(string inputFilePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int rowCount = 0;Di2015NewLine  int columnCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (File.Exists(inputFilePath))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    using (StreamReader sr = File.OpenText(inputFilePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string[] split = null;Di2015NewLine      int lineCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (string s = sr.ReadLine(); s != null; s = sr.ReadLine())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        split = s.Split(new char[] { ',' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (columnCount == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          columnCount = split.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lineCount++;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      rowCount = lineCount;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (rowCount == 0 || columnCount == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new FileEmptyException("No input data");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    throw new FileDoesNotExistException("Input file does not exist");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Dictionary<string, int> counts = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  counts.Add("row_count", rowCount);Di2015NewLine  counts.Add("column_count", columnCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return counts;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9674932Di2015UniqueSeparator// Let's say you want to wait for 5 seconds.Di2015NewLineSystem.Timers.Timer t = new System.Timers.Timer(5000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Has the timer completed?  The callback on the web service?Di2015NewLinebool wsCompleted = false, timerCompleted = false, exceptionThrown = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Need to synchronize access to above, since it will come back onDi2015NewLine// different threads.Di2015NewLineobject l = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set up the callback on the timer.Di2015NewLinet.Elapsed = delegate(object sender, ElapsedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    // Lock access.Di2015NewLine    lock (l)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Set the flag to true.Di2015NewLine        timerCompleted = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the web service has not completed andDi2015NewLine        // the exception was not thrown, thenDi2015NewLine        // throw your exception here.Di2015NewLine        if (!wsCompleted && !exceptionThrown) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The exception is being thrown.Di2015NewLine            exceptionThrown = true;Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set up the callback on the web service.Di2015NewLinews.GetRequestCompleted += Di2015NewLine    delegate(object sender,WS.GetRequestCompletedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        // Dispose of timer when done.Di2015NewLine        using (t)Di2015NewLine        // Lock.Di2015NewLine        lock (l)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The web service call has completed.Di2015NewLine            wsCompleted = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the timer completed and the exception wasDi2015NewLine            // not thrown, then do so here.Di2015NewLine            if (timerCompleted && !exceptionThrown)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // The exception is being thrown.Di2015NewLine                exceptionThrown = true;Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Handle callback.Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Start the timer, make the web service call.Di2015NewLinet.Start();Di2015NewLinews.GetRequest("Login","Username","Password");Di2015NewLine

9680047Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ParameterAssignAndReplacer : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression _source;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConstantExpression _target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal ParameterAssignAndReplacer(ParameterExpression source, ConstantExpression target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _source = source;Di2015NewLine        _target = target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node.Name == _source.Name ?Di2015NewLine            base.VisitConstant(_target) :Di2015NewLine            base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9680047Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExpressionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<TArg2, TResult>> AssignAndReduce<TArg1, TArg2, TResult>(Di2015NewLine        this Expression<Func<TArg1, TArg2, TResult>> func,Di2015NewLine        TArg1 parameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var exprBody = func.Body;Di2015NewLine        var assignedParameter = Expression.Constant(parameter, typeof(TArg1));Di2015NewLine        exprBody = new ParameterAssignAndReplacer(func.Parameters[0], assignedParameter).Visit(exprBody);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TArg2, TResult>>(exprBody, func.Parameters[1]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9681401Di2015UniqueSeparatoruse System.Reflection;Di2015NewLinepublic DataTable LINQToDataTable<T>(IEnumerable<T> varlist)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable dtReturn = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // column names Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] oProps = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (varlist == null) return dtReturn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (T rec in varlist)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (oProps == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                oProps = ((Type)rec.GetType()).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyInfo pi in oProps)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Type colType = pi.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if ((colType.IsGenericType) && (colType.GetGenericTypeDefinition()Di2015NewLine                    == typeof(Nullable<>)))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        colType = colType.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    dtReturn.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(pi.Name, colType));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DataRow dr = dtReturn.NewRow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (PropertyInfo pi in oProps)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dr[pi.Name] = pi.GetValue(rec, null) == null ? DBNull.Value : pi.GetValueDi2015NewLine                (rec, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            dtReturn.Rows.Add(dr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dtReturn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9683506Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Foo, bool>> filter1 = x => x.A > 1;Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Foo, bool>> filter2 = x => x.B > 2.5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // combine two predicates:Di2015NewLine        // need to rewrite one of the lambdas, swapping in the parameter from the otherDi2015NewLine        var rewrittenBody1 = new ReplaceVisitor(Di2015NewLine            filter1.Parameters[0], filter2.Parameters[0]).Visit(filter1.Body);Di2015NewLine        var newFilter = Expression.Lambda<Func<Foo, bool>>(Di2015NewLine            Expression.AndAlso(rewrittenBody1, filter2.Body), filter2.Parameters);Di2015NewLine        // newFilter is equivalent to: x => x.A > 1 && x.B > 2.5Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public float B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ReplaceVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ReplaceVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9683506Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Foo, bool>> filter = x => x.A > 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool applySecondFilter = true;Di2015NewLine        if(applySecondFilter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            filter = Combine(filter, x => x.B > 2.5);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var data = repo.Get(filter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static Expression<Func<T,bool>> Combine<T>(Expression<Func<T,bool>> filter1, Expression<Func<T,bool>> filter2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // combine two predicates:Di2015NewLine        // need to rewrite one of the lambdas, swapping in the parameter from the otherDi2015NewLine        var rewrittenBody1 = new ReplaceVisitor(Di2015NewLine            filter1.Parameters[0], filter2.Parameters[0]).Visit(filter1.Body);Di2015NewLine        var newFilter = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(Di2015NewLine            Expression.AndAlso(rewrittenBody1, filter2.Body), filter2.Parameters);Di2015NewLine        return newFilter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public float B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ReplaceVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ReplaceVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9685770Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class StatResult : IEquatable<StatResult>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Word { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public UInt64 Views { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StatResult(string word, ulong views)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.word = word;Di2015NewLine        this.views = views;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("{0};{1}", word, views);                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 23;Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 31 + Word == null ? 0 : Word.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 31 + Views.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(other as StatResult);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(StatResult other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return other != null &&Di2015NewLine               this.Word == other.Word &&Di2015NewLine               this.Views == other.Views;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9689761Di2015UniqueSeparatorINSERT dbo.Users(Username) Di2015NewLine    SELECT 'User A' UNION ALL SELECT 'User B';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT dbo.Groups(GroupName) Di2015NewLine    SELECT 'Group 1' UNION ALL SELECT 'Group 2';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT dbo.Membership(UserID, GroupID)Di2015NewLine    SELECT 1,1 UNION ALL SELECT 2,2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT dbo.[event](event_start, event_end, group_id, recurring)Di2015NewLine-- user A, almost all day meeting on a specific dateDi2015NewLineSELECT '20120313 07:00', '20120313 18:00', 1, 0 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- user A, recurring meeting every MondayDi2015NewLineUNION ALL SELECT '20120312 17:00', '20120312 18:00', 1, 1 Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- user A, recurring meeting every Tuesday (future)Di2015NewLineUNION ALL SELECT '20120327 14:00', '20120327 15:00', 1, 1; Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine
9689761Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE dbo.GetPossibleMeetingTimesDi2015NewLine    @AskingUserID INT,Di2015NewLine    @TargetUserID INT,Di2015NewLine    @Duration     INT,           -- in minutes!Di2015NewLine    @StartDate    SMALLDATETIME, -- assumes date, no time!Di2015NewLine    @EndDate      SMALLDATETIME  -- again - date, no time!Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    SET NOCOUNT ON;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ;WITH dRange(d) ASDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        -- get the actual dates in the requested rangeDi2015NewLine        -- limited to number of rows in sys.objectsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SELECT TOP (DATEDIFF(DAY, @StartDate, @EndDate)+1) Di2015NewLine            DATEADD(DAY, n-1, @StartDate)Di2015NewLine         FROM (SELECT n = ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY [object_id])Di2015NewLine          FROM sys.objects) AS xDi2015NewLine    ), possible(ds, de) ASDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        -- get all the timeslots of @Duration minutes Di2015NewLine        -- between 7:00 AM and 7:00 PM for each day in Di2015NewLine        -- the range - these are all *potential* slotsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SELECT DATEADD(MINUTE, 30*rn, DATEADD(HOUR, 7, dRange.d)),Di2015NewLine            DATEADD(MINUTE, 30*rn + @Duration, DATEADD(HOUR, 7, dRange.d))Di2015NewLine        FROM (SELECT TOP (720/30) rn = ROW_NUMBER() OVERDi2015NewLine        (ORDER BY [object_id])-1 FROM sys.objects) AS xDi2015NewLine        CROSS JOIN dRangeDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    SELECT p.ds, p.de FROM possible AS p Di2015NewLine    WHERE p.de <= DATEADD(HOUR, 19, DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, 0, p.de), 0)) Di2015NewLine    AND NOT EXISTS Di2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        SELECT 1 FROM Di2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            -- filter down to users with events on the days in the rangeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SELECT group_id, event_start, event_endDi2015NewLine                FROM dbo.[event] Di2015NewLine                WHERE event_start >= @StartDate Di2015NewLine                AND event_start < DATEADD(DAY, 1, @EndDate)Di2015NewLine            UNION ALL Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            -- also include users with recurring events on same weekday(s)Di2015NewLine            -- normalized to the matching day in the rangeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SELECT group_id, Di2015NewLine              event_start = DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, event_start, p.ds), event_start),Di2015NewLine              event_end   = DATEADD(DAY, DATEDIFF(DAY, event_end,   p.ds), event_end)Di2015NewLine            FROM dbo.[event]Di2015NewLine            WHERE recurring = 1 Di2015NewLine            AND event_start <= DATEADD(DAY, 1, @EndDate) -- ignore future eventsDi2015NewLine                    AND event_start >= DATEADD(WEEK, -52, @EndDate) -- 52 weeks out Di2015NewLine            AND DATEDIFF(DAY, event_start, p.ds) % 7 = 0 -- same weekdayDi2015NewLine        ) AS subDi2015NewLine        WHERE sub.group_id IN Di2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            -- this checks that events are within previously scheduled timesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SELECT GroupID FROM dbo.MembershipDi2015NewLine              WHERE UserID IN (@AskingUserID, @TargetUserID)Di2015NewLine              AND (p.de > sub.event_start AND p.ds < sub.event_end)Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    ORDER BY p.ds, p.de;Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine
9689761Di2015UniqueSeparator-- Case 1: User A tries to meet with User B on a day where Di2015NewLine-- both schedules are clear.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXEC dbo.GetPossibleMeetingTimesDi2015NewLine    @AskingUserID = 1,Di2015NewLine    @TargetUserID = 2,Di2015NewLine    @Duration     = 30,Di2015NewLine    @StartDate    = '20120314', -- no events for either userDi2015NewLine    @EndDate      = '20120314';Di2015NewLine

9689761Di2015UniqueSeparator-- Case 3: User A tries to meet with User B for two hours, on Di2015NewLine-- a weekday where User A has a recurring meeting from 5-6 PMDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXEC dbo.GetPossibleMeetingTimesDi2015NewLine    @AskingUserID = 1,Di2015NewLine    @TargetUserID = 2,Di2015NewLine    @Duration     = 120,        Di2015NewLine    @StartDate    = '20120319', -- user A has a recurring meetingDi2015NewLine    @EndDate      = '20120319';Di2015NewLine
9689761Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION dbo.SplitInts( @List VARCHAR(MAX) )Di2015NewLineRETURNS TABLEDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLine   RETURN Di2015NewLine   ( SELECT Item = CONVERT(INT, Item) FROM (Di2015NewLine      SELECT Item = x.i.value('(./text())[1]', 'INT') FROM (Di2015NewLine       SELECT [XML] = CONVERT(XML, '<i>' + REPLACE(@List, ',', '</i><i>') Di2015NewLine         + '</i>').query('.')) AS a CROSS APPLY [XML].nodes('i') AS x(i)) AS yDi2015NewLine       WHERE Item IS NOT NULLDi2015NewLine   );Di2015NewLine
9689761Di2015UniqueSeparatorALTER PROCEDURE dbo.GetPossibleMeetingTimesDi2015NewLine    @UserIDList   VARCHAR(MAX),  -- removed other two parametersDi2015NewLine    @Duration     INT,           Di2015NewLine    @StartDate    SMALLDATETIME, Di2015NewLine    @EndDate      SMALLDATETIME  Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine        WHERE sub.group_id IN -- changed the code within this subqueryDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            SELECT GroupID FROM dbo.Membership AS mDi2015NewLine              INNER JOIN dbo.SplitInts(@UserIDList) AS iDi2015NewLine              ON m.UserID = i.ItemDi2015NewLine              WHERE (p.de > sub.event_start AND p.ds < sub.event_end)Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine...Di2015NewLine

9690651Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Sends a sepcified number of UDP packets to a host or IP Address.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="hostNameOrAddress">The host name or an IP Address to which the UDP packets will be sent.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="destinationPort">The destination port to which the UDP packets will be sent.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="data">The data to send in the UDP packet.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="count">The number of UDP packets to send.</param>Di2015NewLinepublic static void SendUDPPacket(string hostNameOrAddress, int destinationPort, string data, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Validate the destination port numberDi2015NewLine    if (destinationPort < 1 || destinationPort > 65535)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("destinationPort", "Parameter destinationPort must be between 1 and 65,535.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Resolve the host name to an IP AddressDi2015NewLine    IPAddress[] ipAddresses = Dns.GetHostAddresses(hostNameOrAddress);Di2015NewLine    if (ipAddresses.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Host name or address could not be resolved.", "hostNameOrAddress");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use the first IP Address in the listDi2015NewLine    IPAddress destination = ipAddresses[0];            Di2015NewLine    IPEndPoint endPoint = new IPEndPoint(destination, destinationPort);Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Send the packetsDi2015NewLine    Socket socket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Dgram, ProtocolType.Udp);           Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        socket.SendTo(buffer, endPoint);Di2015NewLine    socket.Close();            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9691381Di2015UniqueSeparator<asp:Button OnClick="btnMakeFO_Click" OnClientClick="clickOnce(this, 'ABC...')">Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<script type="text/javascript">Di2015NewLinefunction clickOnce(btn, msg)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Test if we are doing a validationDi2015NewLine    if (typeof(Page_ClientValidate) == 'function')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // if we are doing a validation, return if it's falseDi2015NewLine        if (Page_ClientValidate() == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Ensure that the button is not of type "submit"Di2015NewLine    if (btn.getAttribute('type') == 'button')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The msg attibute is absolutely optionalDi2015NewLine        // msg will be the text of the button while it's disabledDi2015NewLine        if (!msg || (msg='undefined'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            msg = 'Saving.......';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        btn.value = msg;Di2015NewLine        // The magic :DDi2015NewLine        btn.disabled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine</script>Di2015NewLine
9691388Di2015UniqueSeparator        Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(@"C:\\original.jpg");Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLine        BitmapData rawOriginal = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int origByteCount = rawOriginal.Stride * rawOriginal.Height;Di2015NewLine        byte[] origBytes = new Byte[origByteCount];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(rawOriginal.Scan0, origBytes, 0, origByteCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //I want to crop a 100x100 section starting at 15, 15.Di2015NewLine        int startX = 15;Di2015NewLine        int startY = 15;Di2015NewLine        int width = 100;Di2015NewLine        int height = 100;Di2015NewLine        int BPP = 4;        //4 Bpp = 32 bits, 3 = 24, etc.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] croppedBytes = new Byte[width * height * BPP];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Iterate the selected area of the original image, and the full area of the new imageDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < height; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < width * BPP; j += BPP)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int origIndex = (startX * rawOriginal.Stride) + (i * rawOriginal.Stride) + (startY * BPP) + (j);Di2015NewLine                int croppedIndex = (i * width * BPP) + (j);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //copy data: once for each channelDi2015NewLine                for (int k = 0; k < BPP; k++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    croppedBytes[croppedIndex + k] = origBytes[origIndex + k];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //copy new data into a bitmapDi2015NewLine        Bitmap croppedBitmap = new Bitmap(width, height);Di2015NewLine        BitmapData croppedData = croppedBitmap.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height), ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(croppedBytes, 0, croppedData.Scan0, croppedBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bmp.UnlockBits(rawOriginal);Di2015NewLine        croppedBitmap.UnlockBits(croppedData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        croppedBitmap.Save(@"C:\\test.bmp");Di2015NewLine

 // The name of the source columnDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Fill the parameter with the value retrievedDi2015NewLine            // from the text fieldDi2015NewLine            cmd.Parameters["@Find"].Value = txtFind.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Execute the queryDi2015NewLine            rdr = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Fill the list box with the values retrievedDi2015NewLine            lbFound.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLine            while(rdr.Read())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lbFound.Items.Add(rdr["FirstName"].ToString() +Di2015NewLine                " " + rdr["LastName"].ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Print error messageDi2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Close data reader object and database connectionDi2015NewLine            if (rdr != null)Di2015NewLine                rdr.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (con.State == ConnectionState.Open)Di2015NewLine                con.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9701154Di2015UniqueSeparator-- Create the tableDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE TBLTEST (testID NUMBER, name VARCHAR2(50));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE SEQUENCE seq_testDi2015NewLine    MINVALUE 1Di2015NewLine    START WITH 1Di2015NewLine    INCREMENT BY 1Di2015NewLine    NOCACHE;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE pkgTestArrayBindingDi2015NewLineAS Di2015NewLine    -- Define an local scope associative array type called T_ASSOCIATIVE_ARRAY and make it as the type of input parameterDi2015NewLine    TYPE T_ASSOCIATIVE_ARRAY IS TABLE OF VARCHAR(50) INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;Di2015NewLine    PROCEDURE TestArrayBinding(Di2015NewLine        Param1 IN T_ASSOCIATIVE_ARRAY,Di2015NewLine        Param2 IN T_ASSOCIATIVE_ARRAY);Di2015NewLineEND pkgTestArrayBinding;Di2015NewLine/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY pkgTestArrayBindingDi2015NewLineASDi2015NewLine    PROCEDURE TestArrayBinding(Di2015NewLine        Param1 IN  T_ASSOCIATIVE_ARRAY,Di2015NewLine        Param2 IN  T_ASSOCIATIVE_ARRAY)Di2015NewLine    ASDi2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        -- for all loop to insert them in a batchDi2015NewLine        FORALL indx IN 1..Param1.COUNTDi2015NewLine            INSERT INTO tblTest VALUES(seq_test.nextval, Param1(indx));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FORALL indx IN 1..Param2.COUNTDi2015NewLine            INSERT INTO tblTest VALUES(seq_test.nextval, Param2(indx));Di2015NewLine    END TestArrayBinding;Di2015NewLineEND pkgTestArrayBinding;Di2015NewLine/Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        #region MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The main.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private static void cmd = new OracleCommand("BEGIN pkgTestArrayBinding.TestArrayBinding(:Param1, :Param2); END;", con);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var param1 = cmd.Parameters.Add("Param1", OracleDbType.Varchar2);Di2015NewLine            var param2 = cmd.Parameters.Add("Param2", OracleDbType.Varchar2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            param1.Direction = ParameterDirection.Input;Di2015NewLine            param2.Direction = ParameterDirection.Input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Specify that we are binding PL/SQL Associative ArrayDi2015NewLine            param1.CollectionType = OracleCollectionType.PLSQLAssociativeArray;Di2015NewLine            param2.CollectionType = OracleCollectionType.PLSQLAssociativeArray;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Setup the values for PL/SQL Associative ArrayDi2015NewLine            param1.Value = new[] { "First Element", "Second Element ", "Third Element_" };Di2015NewLine            param2.Value = new[] { "Fourth Element", "Fifth Element ", "Sixth Element " };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Specify the maximum number of elements in the PL/SQL Associative ArrayDi2015NewLine            // this should be your array size of your parameter Value.Di2015NewLine            param1.Size = 3;Di2015NewLine            param2.Size = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Setup the ArrayBindSize for each elment in the array, Di2015NewLine            // it should be bigger than the original length of element to avoid truncationDi2015NewLine            param1.ArrayBindSize = new[] { 13, 14, 13 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Setup the ArrayBindSize for Param2Di2015NewLine            param2.ArrayBindSize = new[] { 20, 20, 20 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // execute the cmdDi2015NewLine            cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // I am lazy to query the database table here, but you should get you data now.Di2015NewLine con.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Disconnected");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9707528Di2015UniqueSeparatortypeof(object)
9707528Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void TrimObjectValues(object instance)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if the instance is null we have nothing to do hereDi2015NewLine    if (instance == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var props = instanceDi2015NewLine        .GetType()Di2015NewLine        .GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine        // Ignore indexersDi2015NewLine        .Where(prop => prop.GetIndexParameters().Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        // Must be both readable and writableDi2015NewLine        .Where(prop => prop.CanWrite && prop.CanRead);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo prop in props)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (prop.PropertyType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if we have a string property we trim itDi2015NewLine            string value = (string)prop.GetValue(instance, null);Di2015NewLine            if (value != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = value.Trim();Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(instance, value, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if we don't have a string property we recurseDi2015NewLine            TrimObjectValues(prop.GetValue(instance, null));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9707528Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void TrimObjectValues(object instance)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (instance == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var props = instanceDi2015NewLine        .GetType()Di2015NewLine        .GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine        // Ignore indexersDi2015NewLine        .Where(prop => prop.GetIndexParameters().Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        // Must be both readable and writableDi2015NewLine        .Where(prop => prop.CanWrite && prop.CanRead);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (instance is IEnumerable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var element in (IEnumerable)instance)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TrimObjectValues(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo prop in props)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (prop.PropertyType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string value = (string)prop.GetValue(instance, null);Di2015NewLine            if (value != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = value.Trim();Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(instance, value, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TrimObjectValues(prop.GetValue(instance, null));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9708128Di2015UniqueSeparatorCarRepository
9708128Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CarRepositoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ChangeTracker<Car> _cars = new ChangeTracker<Car>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Car> GetCars()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //TODO: JET/ADO code here, you would obviously do in a for/while loopDi2015NewLine        int dbId1 = 1;Di2015NewLine        string make1 = "Ford";Di2015NewLine        string model1 = "Focus";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //TODO: create or update car objectsDi2015NewLine        Car car1;Di2015NewLine        if (!_cars.IsTracking(dbId1))Di2015NewLine            car1 = new Car();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            car1 = _cars.GetItem(dbId1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        car1.Make = make1;Di2015NewLine        car1.Model = model1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!_cars.IsTracking(dbId1))Di2015NewLine            _cars.StartTracking(dbId1, car1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _cars.GetTrackedItems();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SaveCars(IEnumerable<Car> cars)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var changedItem in _cars.GetChangedItems().Intersect(cars))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //TODO: JET/ADO code here to update the itemDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var newItem in cars.Except(_cars.GetTrackedItems()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //TODO: JET/ADO code here to add the item to the DB and get its new IDDi2015NewLine            int newId = 5;Di2015NewLine            _cars.StartTracking(newId, newItem);Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _cars.SetNewCheckpoint();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9708128Di2015UniqueSeparatorChangeTracker
9708128Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ChangeTracker<T> where T : IEquatable<T>, ICloneableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //item "checkpoints" that are internal to this listDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<int, T> _originals = new Dictionary<int, T>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T, int> _originalIndex = new Dictionary<T, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //the current, live-edited objectsDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<int, T> _copies = new Dictionary<int, T>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T, int> _copyIndex = new Dictionary<T, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsChanged(T copy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var original = _originals[_copyIndex[copy]];Di2015NewLine        return original.Equals(copy);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<T> GetChangedItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _copies.Values.Where(c => IsChanged(c));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<T> GetTrackedItems()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _copies.Values;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetNewCheckpoint()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var copy in this.GetChangedItems().ToList())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int dbId = _copyIndex[copy];Di2015NewLine            var oldOriginal = _originals[dbId];Di2015NewLine            var newOriginal = (T)copy.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _originals[dbId] = newOriginal;Di2015NewLine            _originalIndex.Remove(oldOriginal);Di2015NewLine            _originalIndex.Add(newOriginal, dbId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void StartTracking(int dbId, T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newOriginal = (T)item.Clone();Di2015NewLine        _originals[dbId] = newOriginal;Di2015NewLine        _originalIndex[newOriginal] = dbId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _copies[dbId] = item;Di2015NewLine        _copyIndex[item] = dbId;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void StopTracking(int dbId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var original = _originals[dbId];Di2015NewLine        var copy = _copies[dbId];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _copies.Remove(dbId);Di2015NewLine        _originals.Remove(dbId);Di2015NewLine        _copyIndex.Remove(copy);Di2015NewLine        _originalIndex.Remove(original);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsTracking(int dbId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _originals.ContainsKey(dbId);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsTracking(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _copyIndex.ContainsKey(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T GetItem(int dbId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _liveCopies[dbId];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9708128Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var repository = new CarRepository();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var cars = repository.GetCars().ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //make some arbitrary changes...Di2015NewLine    cars[0].Make = "Chevy";Di2015NewLine    cars[1].Model = "Van";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //when we call SaveCars, the repository will detect thatDi2015NewLine    //both of these cars have changed, and write them to the databaseDi2015NewLine    repository.SaveCars(cars);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9708224Di2015UniqueSeparator// sampleDESCBCEncryptionDi2015NewLineprivate static int sampleDESCBCEncryption( Di2015NewLine    byte[] secretKey, byte[] initVector, byte[] plainText, byte[] cipherText, intDi2015NewLine    dataLength ) Di2015NewLine    throws CryptoException, IOExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a new DES key based on the 8 bytes in the secretKey arrayDi2015NewLine    DESKey key = new DESKey( secretKey );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new initialization vector using the 8 bytes in initVectorDi2015NewLine    InitializationVector iv = new InitializationVector( initVector );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new byte array output stream for use in encryptionDi2015NewLine    NoCopyByteArrayOutputStream out = new NoCopyByteArrayOutputStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a new instance of a BlockEncryptor passing in an instance of a CBC encryptor engineDi2015NewLine    // (containing an instance of a DES encryptor engine), the initialization vector, and theDi2015NewLine    // output streamDi2015NewLine    BlockEncryptor cryptoStream = new BlockEncryptor( Di2015NewLine        new CBCEncryptorEngine( new DESEncryptorEngine( key ), iv ), out );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Write dataLength bytes from plainText to the CFB encryptor streamDi2015NewLine    cryptoStream.write( plainText, 0, dataLength );Di2015NewLine    cryptoStream.close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now copy the encrypted bytes from out into cipherText and return the lengthDi2015NewLine    int finalLength = out.size();Di2015NewLine    System.arraycopy( out.getByteArray(), 0, cipherText, 0, finalLength );Di2015NewLine    return finalLength;Di2015NewLine}    Di2015NewLine

CaptureVBAErrorsTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class CaptureVBAErrorsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void runApp(string databaseName, string function)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            VBA.VBComponent f = null;Di2015NewLine            VBA.VBComponent f2 = null;Di2015NewLine            Microsoft.Office.Interop.Access.Application app = null;Di2015NewLine "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Step 1: Programatically create a new temporary class module in the target Access file, with which to call the target function in the Access databaseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Create a Guid to append to the object name, so that in case the temporary class and module somehow get "stuck",Di2015NewLine                //the temp objects won't interfere with other objects each other (if there are multiples).Di2015NewLine                string tempGuid = Guid.NewGuid().ToString("N");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               f.Properties.Item("Instancing").Value = 2;Di2015NewLine                f.Name = "TEMP_CLASS_" + tempGuid;Di2015NewLine                f.CodeModule.AddFromString(Di2015NewLine                    "Public Sub TempClassCall()\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                    "   Call " + function + "\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                    "End Sub\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine app.VBE.ActiveVBProject.VBComponents.Add(VBA.vbext_ComponentType.vbext_ct_StdModule);Di2015NewLine                f2.Name = "TEMP_MODULE_" + tempGuidDi2015NewLine instantiateTempClass_{0} = New TEMP_CLASS_{0}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                    "End Function"Di2015NewLine                    ,tempGuid));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Step 3: Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing, ref Missing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Step 4: Call the method on the TEMP_CLASS_* object.Di2015NewLine                Microsoft.VisualBasic.Interaction.CallByName(tempObject, "TempClassCall", Microsoft.VisualBasic.CallType.Method);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (COMException e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("A VBA Exception occurred in file:" + e.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("A general exception has occurred: " + e.StackTrace.ToString());Di2015NewLine 9722198Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MefControllerFactory : DefaultControllerFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly CompositionContainer container;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<IController, Lazy<object, object>> exports;Di2015NewLine    private readonly object syncRoot;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MefControllerFactory(CompositionContainer container)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (container == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("container");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.container = container;Di2015NewLine        this.exports = new Dictionary<IController, Lazy<object, object>>();Di2015NewLine        this.syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override IController GetControllerInstance(Di2015NewLine        RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var export = this.container.GetExports(Di2015NewLine            controllerType, null, null).Single();Di2015NewLine        var controller = (IController)export.Value;Di2015NewLine        lock (this.syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.exports.Add(controller, export);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return controller;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void ReleaseController(IController controller)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (this.syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var export = this.exports[controller];Di2015NewLine            this.exports.Remove(controller);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.container.ReleaseExport(export);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.ReleaseController(controller);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9732613Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string[] GetWords(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return text.Split(new[]{' '}); // add more seperators if you needDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<string> GetCombinations(string[] words, int lookAt = 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (lookAt >= words.Length) return new[]{""};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var currentWord = words[lookAt];Di2015NewLine    var synonymsForCurrentWord = GetSynonmys(currentWord);Di2015NewLine    var combinationsForRest = GetCombinations(words, lookAt + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return synonymsForCurrentWord.SelectMany(synonym => combinationsForRest.Select(rest => synonym + " " + rest));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9732613Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var test = new Synonmys(Tuple.Create("ca", "ca"),Di2015NewLine                                Tuple.Create("ca", "california"),Di2015NewLine                                Tuple.Create("ln", "ln"),Di2015NewLine                                Tuple.Create("ln", "lane"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var comb in test.GetCombinations("2 ln ca"))Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Combination: " + comb);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass SynonmysDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, IEnumerable<string>> synonyms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Synonmys(params Tuple<string, string>[] syns )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        synonyms = syns.GroupBy(s => s.Item1).ToDictionary(g => g.Key, g => g.Select(kvp => kvp.Item2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<string> GetSynonmys(string word)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return synonyms.ContainsKey(word) ? synonyms[word] : new[]{word};Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string[] GetWords(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return text.Split(new[]{' '}); // add more seperators if you needDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<string> GetCombinations(string[] words, int lookAt = 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (lookAt >= words.Length) return new[]{""};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var currentWord = words[lookAt];Di2015NewLine        var synonymsForCurrentWord = GetSynonmys(currentWord);Di2015NewLine        var combinationsForRest = GetCombinations(words, lookAt + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return synonymsForCurrentWord.SelectMany(synonym => combinationsForRest.Select(rest => synonym + " " + rest));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<string> GetCombinations(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetCombinations(GetWords(text));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9734731Di2015UniqueSeparatorIf Exists(Select 1 from sysobjects where name = 'CheckTables')Di2015NewLine  Drop Table CheckTablesDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineSelect o.id oid, o.name oname, c.colid cid, c.name cname, t.name ctype, c.xusertype, c.[length] tlength, c.prec cprec, c.scale cscale, isnullable Di2015NewLineinto CheckTablesDi2015NewLinefrom sysobjects o Di2015NewLineinner join syscolumns c on c.id = o.idDi2015NewLineinner join systypes t on t.xusertype = c.xusertypeDi2015NewLinewhere o.name not like '%dt_%' and o.category <> 2 and o.type = 'U'Di2015NewLineorder by o.id, c.colid Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDelete CheckTables where oname = 'CheckTables'Di2015NewLine

int";Di2015NewLine        cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //BCP your data from MASTER TABLE into the CheckTables of the UpgradeDBDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.CommandText = "Select oname, cname, ctype, IsNull(tlength, 0), IsNull(cprec, 0), IsNull(cscale, 0), isnullable from CheckTables hr\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                          "where cname not in (Select name from syscolumns where id = object_id(oname)\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                          "and length = hr.tlength\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                          "and xusertype = hr.xusertype\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                          "and isnullable = hr.isnullable)\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine                          "order by oname";Di2015NewLine        SqlDataReader read = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine        string LastTable = "";Di2015NewLine        bool TableExists = false;Di2015NewLine        bool ColumnExists = false;Di2015NewLine        while(read.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(LastTable != read[0].ToString())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LastTable = read[0].ToString();Di2015NewLine                TableExists = false;Di2015NewLine                if (!CheckIfTableExist(LastTable))Di2015NewLine                    TableExists = CreateTable(LastTable);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    TableExists = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (TableExists)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!CheckIfColumnExists(read[0].ToString(), read[1].ToString()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    CreateColumn(read[0].ToString(), read[1].ToString(), read[2].ToString(), Convert.ToBoolean(read[6].ToString()));Di2015NewLine                    ColumnExists = false; //You don't want to alter the column if you just created itDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    ColumnExists = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if(ColumnExists)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    AlterColumn(read[0].ToString(), read[1].ToString(), read[2].ToString(),  Di2015NewLine                        Convert.ToInt32(read[3].ToString()), Convert.ToInt32(read[4].ToString()), Di2015NewLine                        Convert.ToInt32(read[5].ToString()), Convert.ToBoolean(read[6].ToString()));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        read.Close();Di2015NewLine        read.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        conn.Close();Di2015NewLine        cmd.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        conn.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool CheckIfTableExist(string TableName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection("Connection String");Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand();Di2015NewLine        conn.Open();Di2015NewLine        cmd.Connection = conn;Di2015NewLine        cmd.CommandText = "Select IsNull(object_id('" + TableName + "'), 0)";Di2015NewLine        Int64 check = Convert.ToInt64(cmd.ExecuteScalar());Di2015NewLine        conn.Close();Di2015NewLine        cmd.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        conn.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        return check != 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool CreateTable(string TableName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Write your code here to create your tableDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 9734989Di2015UniqueSeparator// you should have a list of primitive types to use in SQL IN keywordDi2015NewLinevar ids = articleByTags.Tags.Select(t => t.Id).ToList();Di2015NewLinevar query = (from article in context.ArticlesDi2015NewLine              // do you want same article again? NO! so remove the current articleDi2015NewLine             where article.Id != articleByTags.IdDi2015NewLine             // this line would create a IN statement to SQLDi2015NewLine             // if you don't want to load common tags, you can merge this lineDi2015NewLine             // by the next it, and just create a COUNT()Di2015NewLine             let commonTags = article.Tags.Where(tag => ids.Contains(tag.Id))Di2015NewLine             let commonCount = commonTags.Count()Di2015NewLine             // there as any?Di2015NewLine             where commonCount > 0Di2015NewLine             // ascending! not descending! you want most common Di2015NewLine             orderby commonCount ascendingDi2015NewLine             // create your projectionDi2015NewLine             select new {Di2015NewLine                 Id = article.Id,Di2015NewLine                 Title = article.Title,Di2015NewLine                 Tags = article.Tags,Di2015NewLine                 Commons = commonTags,Di2015NewLine                 CommonCount = commonCountDi2015NewLine                 // or any property you want...Di2015NewLine            })Di2015NewLine            // how many you want to take? for example 5Di2015NewLine            .Take(5)Di2015NewLine            .ToList();Di2015NewLine

9735602Di2015UniqueSeparator    private IEnumerable<string> BreakString(string source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var delimiter = '/';Di2015NewLine        var head = source.TakeWhile(c => c != delimiter);Di2015NewLine        if (!head.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var tail = source.SkipWhile(c => c != delimiter)Di2015NewLine            .Skip(1);Di2015NewLine        yield return String.Join("", head);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var t in BreakString(String.Join("", tail)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return t;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// usageDi2015NewLinefrom s in BreakString(source)Di2015NewLine

     // Add to a list so we dispose all the sockets when the timer ticks.Di2015NewLine        s.ConnectAsync(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void e_Completed(object sender, SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.ConnectSocket != null)     //if there's a connection Add its info to a listviewDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(new NetworkStream(e.ConnectSocket));Di2015NewLine            ListViewItem item = new ListViewItem();Di2015NewLine            item.Text = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            item.SubItems.Add(((IPEndPoint)e.RemoteEndPoint).Address.ToString());Di2015NewLine            item.SubItems.Add("Online");Di2015NewLine            AddServer(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    delegate void AddItem(ListViewItem item);Di2015NewLine    private void AddServer(ListViewItem item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Invoke(new AddItem(AddServer), item);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        listServer.Items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void timer_tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var s in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((Socket)s.UserToken).Dispose();     //disposing all sockets that's pending or connected.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9739918Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        List<double> testResults = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        int upperBound = int.Parse(args[0]) + 1;Di2015NewLine        int tests = int.Parse(args[1]);Di2015NewLine        int lowerBound = int.Parse(args[2]);   // THIS LINE CHANGESDi2015NewLine        int sum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int iTest = 0; iTest < tests; iTest++) {Di2015NewLine            sum = 0;Di2015NewLine            GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine            sw.Reset();Di2015NewLine            sw.Start();Di2015NewLine            for (int lvl1 = lowerBound; lvl1 < upperBound; lvl1++)Di2015NewLine                for (int lvl2 = lowerBound; lvl2 < upperBound; lvl2++)Di2015NewLine                    for (int lvl3 = lowerBound; lvl3 < upperBound; lvl3++)Di2015NewLine                        for (int lvl4 = lowerBound; lvl4 < upperBound; lvl4++)Di2015NewLine                            for (int lvl5 = lowerBound; lvl5 < upperBound; lvl5++)Di2015NewLine                                sum++;Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine            testResults.Add(sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double avg = testResults.Average();Di2015NewLine        double stdev = testResults.StdDev();Di2015NewLine        string fmt = "{0,13} {1,13} {2,13} {3,13}"; string bar = new string('-', 13);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(fmt, "Iterations", "Average (ms)", "Std Dev (ms)", "Per It. (ns)");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(fmt, bar, bar, bar, bar);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(fmt, sum, avg.ToString("F3"), stdev.ToString("F3"),Di2015NewLine                          ((avg * 1000000) / (double)sum).ToString("F3"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class Ext {Di2015NewLine    public static double StdDev(this IEnumerable<double> vals) {Di2015NewLine        double result = 0;Di2015NewLine        int cnt = vals.Count();Di2015NewLine        if (cnt > 1) {Di2015NewLine            double avg = vals.Average();Di2015NewLine            double sum = vals.Sum(d => Math.Pow(d - avg, 2));Di2015NewLine            result = Math.Sqrt((sum) / (cnt - 1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9739918Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T Confuser<T>(T d) {Di2015NewLine    decimal d1 = (decimal)Convert.ChangeType(d, typeof(decimal));Di2015NewLine    List<decimal> L = new List<decimal>() { d1, d1 };Di2015NewLine    decimal d2 = L.Average();Di2015NewLine    if (d1 - d2 < 0.1m) {Di2015NewLine        return (T)Convert.ChangeType(d2, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        // This will never actually happen :)Di2015NewLine        return (T)Convert.ChangeType(0, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9739934Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class Configuration : DbMigrationsConfiguration<YourDbContext>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Configuration()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Because the Package Manager Console (NuGet) instantiates YourDbContext with the empty constructor,Di2015NewLine        // a custom connection must be specified. Based on http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/?p=5603Di2015NewLine        // Note that the MySqlProviderFactory must also be present in Web.config or App.config in the *startup project*Di2015NewLine        // for this to work!   <remove invariant="Devart.Data.MySql" />Di2015NewLine              <add name="dotConnect for MySQL" invariant="Devart.Data.MySql" description="Devart dotConnect for MySQL" type="Devart.Data.MySql.MySqlProviderFactory, Devart.Data.MySql, Version=6.30.196.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=09af7300eec23701" />Di2015NewLine            </DbProviderFactories>Di2015NewLine          </system.data>Di2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Apply the IgnoreSchemaName workaroundDi2015NewLine MySql.Di2015NewLine        var connectionInfo = MySqlConnectionInfo.CreateConnection("<Your ConnectionString>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TargetDatabase = connectionInfo;Di2015NewLine        SetSqlGenerator(connectionInfo.GetInvariantName(), new MySqlEntityMigrationSqlGenerator());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Enable automatic migrations if you likeDi2015NewLine        AutomaticMigrationsEnabled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // There is some problem with referencing EntityFramework 4.3.1.0 for me, so another fix that needsDi2015NewLine        // to be applied in Web.config is this:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine          <runtime>Di2015NewLine            <assemblyBinding>Di2015NewLine              <!-- This redirection is needed for EntityFramework Migrations through the Package Manager Console (NuGet) -->Di2015NewLine              <dependentAssembly>Di2015NewLine                <assemblyIdentity name="EntityFramework" publicKeyToken="b77a5c561934e089" />Di2015NewLine                <bindingRedirect oldVersion="4.3.0.0" newVersion="4.3.1.0" />Di2015NewLine              </dependentAssembly>Di2015NewLine            </assemblyBinding>Di2015NewLine          </runtime>Di2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // After these Web.config additions, running migrations in Package Manager Console should be as easy as:Di2015NewLine        // Update-Database -Verbose -ProjectName Your.MigrationsProjectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Creating new migrations:Di2015NewLine        // Add-Migration -Name MigrationDescription -ProjectName Your.MigrationsProjectDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9741895Di2015UniqueSeparator[ThreadStatic]Di2015NewLineprivate static Random _random;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Random RandomDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int seed = Environment.TickCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _random ?? 9741958Di2015UniqueSeparatorIObservable<T> eventStream; //you have this defined and assigned somewhereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IDisposable Subscribe<T>(IObserver<T> observer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //let's break this method into multiple linesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IObservable<T> whereObs = eventStream.Where(e => e is T);Di2015NewLine    //whereObs now has a reference to eventStream (and thus will keep it alive), Di2015NewLine    //but eventStream knows nothing of whereObs (thus whereObs will not be kept alive by eventStream)Di2015NewLine    IObservable<T> castObs = whereObs.Cast<T>();Di2015NewLine    //as with whereObs, castObs has a reference to whereObs,Di2015NewLine    //but no one has a reference to castObsDi2015NewLine    IDisposable ret = castObs.Subscribe(observer);Di2015NewLine    //here is where it gets tricky.Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9741958Di2015UniqueSeparatorret

ctx.Response.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring Execute(HttpListenerContext ctx, MyService service)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection 9747580Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string drawTextOnMarker(string markerfile, string text, string newfilename,Color textColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Uri uri = new Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLine                g.TextRenderingHint = System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAliasGridFit;Di2015NewLine                StringFormat strFormat = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLine                strFormat.Alignment = StringAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLine                SolidBrush myBrush = new SolidBrush(textColor);Di2015NewLine                float fontsize = 10;Di2015NewLine                bool sizeSetupCompleted = false;Di2015NewLine                while (!sizeSetupCompleted)Di2015NewLine                {                        Di2015NewLine                    SizeF mySize = g.MeasureString(text, new Font("Verdana", fontsize, FontStyle.Bold));Di2015NewLine                    if (mySize.Width > 24 || mySize.Height > 13)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        fontsize-= float.Parse("0.1");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sizeSetupCompleted = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                g.DrawString(text, new Font("Verdana", fontsize, FontStyle.Bold), myBrush, new RectangleF(4, 3, 24, 8), strFormat);Di2015NewLine                bmp.Save(System.Web.HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath(newfilename));Di2015NewLine                return newfilename.Substring(2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return markerfile.Substring(2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return newfilename.Substring(2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9747644Di2015UniqueSeparator    static Byte GetByte(this BitArray array)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Byte byt = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 7; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            byt = (byte)((byt << 1) | (array[i] ? 1 : 0));Di2015NewLine        return byt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
