9747683Di2015UniqueSeparatorMatch
9747683Di2015UniqueSeparatorTournament
9747683Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace tournamentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class MatchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int teamid1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int teamid2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int roundnumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int winner { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Match(int id, int teamid1, int teamid2, int roundnumber, int winner)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.id = id;Di2015NewLine            this.teamid1 = teamid1;Di2015NewLine            this.teamid2 = teamid2;Di2015NewLine            this.roundnumber = roundnumber;Di2015NewLine            this.winner = winner;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TournamentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public SortedList<int, SortedList<int, Match>> TournamentRoundMatches { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public Match ThirdPlaceMatch { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Tournament(int rounds)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.TournamentRoundMatches = new SortedList<int, SortedList<int, Match>>();Di2015NewLine            this.GenerateTournamentResults(rounds);Di2015NewLine            if (rounds > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.GenerateThirdPlaceResult(rounds);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddMatch(Match m)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this.TournamentRoundMatches.ContainsKey(m.roundnumber))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!this.TournamentRoundMatches[m.roundnumber].ContainsKey(m.id))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.TournamentRoundMatches[m.roundnumber].Add(m.id, m);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.TournamentRoundMatches.Add(m.roundnumber, new SortedList<int, Match>());Di2015NewLine                this.TournamentRoundMatches[m.roundnumber].Add(m.id, m);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void GenerateTournamentResults(int rounds)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random WinnerRandomizer = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int round = 1, match_id = 1; round <= rounds; round++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int matches_in_round = 1 << (rounds - round);Di2015NewLine                for (int round_match = 1; round_match <= matches_in_round; round_match++, match_id++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int team1_id;Di2015NewLine                    int team2_id;Di2015NewLine                    int winner;Di2015NewLine                    if (round == 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        team1_id = (match_id * 2) - 1;Di2015NewLine                        team2_id = (match_id * 2);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        int match1 = (match_id - (matches_in_round * 2) + (round_match - 1));Di2015NewLine                        int match2 = match1 + 1;Di2015NewLine                        team1_id = this.TournamentRoundMatches[round - 1][match1].winner;Di2015NewLine                        team2_id = this.TournamentRoundMatches[round - 1][match2].winner;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    winner = (WinnerRandomizer.Next(1, 3) == 1) ? team1_id : team2_id;Di2015NewLine                    this.AddMatch(new Match(match_id, team1_id, team2_id, round, winner));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void GenerateThirdPlaceResult(int rounds)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random WinnerRandomizer = new Random();Di2015NewLine            int semifinal_matchid1 = this.TournamentRoundMatches[rounds - 1].Keys.ElementAt(0);Di2015NewLine            int semifinal_matchid2 = this.TournamentRoundMatches[rounds - 1].Keys.ElementAt(1);Di2015NewLine            Match semifinal_1 = this.TournamentRoundMatches[rounds - 1][semifinal_matchid1];Di2015NewLine            Match semifinal_2 = this.TournamentRoundMatches[rounds - 1][semifinal_matchid2];Di2015NewLine            int semifinal_loser1 = (semifinal_1.winner == semifinal_1.teamid1) ? semifinal_1.teamid2 : semifinal_1.teamid1;Di2015NewLine            int semifinal_loser2 = (semifinal_2.winner == semifinal_2.teamid1) ? semifinal_2.teamid2 : semifinal_2.teamid1;Di2015NewLine            int third_place_winner = (WinnerRandomizer.Next(1, 3) == 1) ? semifinal_loser1 : semifinal_loser2;Di2015NewLine            this.ThirdPlaceMatch = new Match((1 << rounds) + 1, semifinal_loser1, semifinal_loser2, 1, third_place_winner);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9747683Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing effective_match_id;Di2015NewLine            int rounds = tournament.TournamentRoundMatches.Count;Di2015NewLine            int teams = 1 << rounds;Di2015NewLine            int max_rows = teams << 1;Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder HTMLTable = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HTMLTable.AppendLine("<style type=\\"text/css\\">");Di2015NewLine cellspacing=\\"0\\">");Di2015NewLine            for (int row = 0; row <= max_rows; row++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cumulative_matches = 0;Di2015NewLine                HTMLTable.AppendLine("    <tr>");Di2015NewLine                for (int col = 1; col <= rounds + 1; col++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    match_span = 1 << (col + 1);Di2015NewLine                    match_white_span = (1 << col) - 1;Di2015NewLine                    column_stagger_offset = match_white_span >> 1;Di2015NewLine                    if (row == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (col <= rounds)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            HTMLTable.AppendLine("   HTMLTable.AppendLine("        <th class=\\"thd\\">Winner</th>");Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (row == 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        HTMLTable.AppendLine("        <td class=\\"white_span\\" rowspan=\\"" + (match_white_span - column_stagger_offset) + "\\"></td>");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        effective_row = row + column_stagger_offset;Di2015NewLine                        if (col <= rounds)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            position_in_match_span = effective_row % match_span;Di2015NewLine                            position_in_match_span = (position_in_match_span == 0) ? match_span : position_in_match_span;Di2015NewLine                            col_match_num = (effective_row / match_span) + ((position_in_match_span < match_span) ? 1 : 0);Di2015NewLine                            effective_match_id = cumulative_matches + col_match_num;Di2015NewLine                            if ((position_in_match_span == 1) && (effective_row % match_span == position_in_match_span))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                HTMLTable.AppendLine("        <td class=\\"white_span\\" rowspan=\\"" + match_white_span + "\\"></td>");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            else if ((position_in_match_span == (match_span >> 1)) && (effective_row % match_span == position_in_match_span))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine 9750679Di2015UniqueSeparatorFoo
9750679Di2015UniqueSeparatorNullReferenceException
9750679Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication3Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    delegate void myFoo(int i, string s);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Foo(1, "hello");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // From a delegateDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Delegate Food = (myFoo)Foo;Di2015NewLine                ((dynamic)Food).Invoke(2, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (NullReferenceException ex)Di2015NewLine            { Console.WriteLine("Caught NullReferenceException at " + ex.StackTrace); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MethodInfo Foom = typeof(Program).GetMethod("Foo", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // From a MethodInfo, obtaining a delegate from itDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Delegate Food = Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<,>).MakeGenericType(Foom.GetParameters().Select(p => p.ParameterType).ToArray()), Foom);Di2015NewLine                ((dynamic)Food).Invoke(2, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (NullReferenceException ex)Di2015NewLine            { Console.WriteLine("Caught NullReferenceException at " + ex.StackTrace); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // From a MethodInfo, creating a plain ActionDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Expression.Lambda<Action>(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                        Foom,Di2015NewLine                        Expression.Constant(2),Di2015NewLine                        Expression.Constant(null, typeof(string)))).Compile()();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (NullReferenceException ex)Di2015NewLine            { Console.WriteLine("Caught NullReferenceException at " + ex.StackTrace); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // MethodBase.Invoke, exception gets wrappedDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Foom.Invoke(null, new object[] { 2, null });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (NullReferenceException)Di2015NewLine            { Console.WriteLine("Won't catch NullReferenceException"); }Di2015NewLine            catch (TargetInvocationException)Di2015NewLine            { Console.WriteLine("Bad!"); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // DynamicInvoke, exception gets wrappedDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Delegate Food = (myFoo)Foo;Di2015NewLine                Food.DynamicInvoke(2, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (NullReferenceException)Di2015NewLine            { Console.WriteLine("Won't catch NullReferenceException"); }Di2015NewLine            catch (TargetInvocationException)Di2015NewLine            { Console.WriteLine("Bad!"); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Foo(int i, string s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("i=" + i + ", s.Length = " + s.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9751342Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar xmlFileA = //first xmlDi2015NewLinevar xmlFileb = // second xmlDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar docA = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLinevar docB = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedocA.LoadXml(xmlFileA);Di2015NewLinedocB.LoadXml(xmlFileb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar isDifferent = HaveDiferentStructure(docA.ChildNodes, docB.ChildNodes);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("----->>> isDifferent: " + isDifferent.ToString());Di2015NewLine
9751342Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool HaveDiferentStructure(Di2015NewLine            XmlNodeList xmlNodeListA, XmlNodeList xmlNodeListB)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(xmlNodeListA.Count != xmlNodeListB.Count) return true;                Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(var i=0; i < xmlNodeListA.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         var nodeA = xmlNodeListA[i];Di2015NewLine         var nodeB = xmlNodeListB[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (nodeA.Attributes == null)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              if (nodeB.Attributes != null)Di2015NewLine                   return true;Di2015NewLine              elseDi2015NewLine                   continue;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if(nodeA.Attributes.Count != nodeB.Attributes.Count Di2015NewLine              || nodeA.Name != nodeB.Name) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         for(var j=0; j < nodeA.Attributes.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine              var attrA = nodeA.Attributes[j];Di2015NewLine              var attrB = nodeB.Attributes[j];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              if (attrA.Name != attrB.Name) return true;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          if (nodeA.HasChildNodes && nodeB.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              return HaveDiferentStructure(nodeA.ChildNodes, nodeB.ChildNodes);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              return true;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9753588Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static TimeSpan RunAsParallelBatches(int inserts, int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine    watch.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // batch the data to be inserted Di2015NewLine    List<List<int>> batches = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLine    for (int g = 0; g < inserts / batchSize; g++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<int> numbers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        int start = g * batchSize;Di2015NewLine        int end = start + batchSize;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = start; i < end; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            numbers.Add(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        batches.Add(numbers);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // insert each batch in parallelDi2015NewLine    Parallel.ForEach(batches,Di2015NewLine        (batch) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (DataClasses1DataContext ctx = new DataClasses1DataContext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (int number in batch)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ctx.Tables.InsertOnSubmit(new Table() { Number = number });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ctx.SubmitChanges();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine    return watch.Elapsed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9755250Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] SeparateAndGetLast(byte[] source, byte[] separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  for (var i = 0; i < source.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     if(Equals(source, separator, i))Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine       var index = i + separator.Length;Di2015NewLine       var part = new byte[source.Length - index];Di2015NewLine       Array.Copy(source, index, part, 0, part.Length);Di2015NewLine       return part;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  throw new Exception("not found");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[][] Separate(byte[] source, byte[] separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var Parts = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine    var Index = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte[] Part;Di2015NewLine    for (var I = 0; I < source.Length; ++I)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Equals(source, separator, I))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Part = new byte[I - Index];Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(source, Index, Part, 0, Part.Length);Di2015NewLine            Parts.Add(Part);Di2015NewLine            Index = I + separator.Length;Di2015NewLine            I += separator.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Part = new byte[source.Length - Index];Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(source, Index, Part, 0, Part.Length);Di2015NewLine    Parts.Add(Part);Di2015NewLine    return Parts.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool Equals(byte[] source, byte[] separator, int index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < separator.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    if (index + i >= source.Length || source[index + i] != separator[i])Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
